62005010	Uju linga ịkummwịtika Umwana gwa Kyala, jo ali nalo ulusịsịmịkisyo mụ̄nda mmyake; lolị uju linga atịkummwịtika Kyala jo ampelịle ukuja ntūngulu, papo akalwịtika ulusịsịmịkisyo ulu Kyala ansịsịmikị̄sye Umwanāke.
62005011	Ulwene ulusịsịmịkisyo lo ulu, ulwa kuti Kyala atupēle ubūmi bwa bwịla bwịla; lelo ubwene ubūmị bububu, bo ubu buli mmwanāke.
62005012	Uju linga ali nagwe Umwana, jo ali nabo ubūmị; lolị uju linga akaja nagwe Umwana gwa Kyala, jo akaja nabo ubūmị.
62005013	Syo ngubasị̄mbila sịsịsị, papo nguti mụmanyege umwe ukuti mụli nabo ubūmị ubusịtakumalika sịku mwe mụjị̄tị̄ke īngamụ ja Mwana gwa Kyala.
62005014	Ulwene ulusūbilo ulu tunsūbị̄le umwene, lo ulu tumēnye ukuti fyosa ifị linga tụkusūma kumyake ukufwana nubwịgane bwake, ịkutupilika.
62005015	Lelo linga tumēnye ukuti ịkutupilika mụli isị tụkusūma, po tumēnye ukuti ịkutupa kāko linga tusūmịle.
62005016	Linga jumo ịkummbona ugwamyabo ịkutula īnōngwa iji jikaja mbelabufwe, po ansūmilege kwa Kyala, po papo umwene Kyala ịsakumpaga ubūmị. Nịkubala aba ubutulanōngwa bwabo bukaja bupelabufwe; buliko ubutulanōngwa ubu bukaja bupelabufwe.
62005017	Ubutulanōngwa bōsa mbị̄bị, lolị sịlịko īmbị̄bị isị sịkaja mbelabufwe.
62005018	Tumenye ukuti gwesa uju linga apāpị̄gwe na Kyala atịkutula īnōngwa, papo Umwana gwa Kyala ịkunndịndịlila, po ummbị̄bị jula akabagila ukummōnānga.
62005019	Uswe tumēnye ukuti tuli ba ju Kyala kangi tumēnye ukuti ikị̄su kyosa kili mmaka ga setano.
62005020	Kangi tumēnye ukuti umwana gwa Kyala ịsịle atupēle amahala aga kummanyịla ugwa bwanalōlị; kangi tuli mmyake ugwa bwanalōlị, mmwanāke Jesụ Kilisịtị. Jujuju jo Kyala gwanalōlị kangi jo būmị ubusịtakumalika sịku.
62005021	Mwe bānịke, amụgyepukilege gyabakyala.
63001001	Jo une ne nkulu gwa kipānga, nikukusị̄mbịla gwe mwehe gwe nsūngulịgwa, pamopēne nabānāke, aba une mbaganịle nalōlị. Kangi ngaja jo jujune nịmwene ne mbaganịle, lolị bōsa nāba babumēnye ubwanalolị babaganịle umwe,
63001002	panōngwa ja bwanalōlị ubu buli mmyitu, kangi ubu bwịsakujaga nanụswe bwịla ịtolo.
63001003	Ilị̄pyana, ikisa, nulutēngāno, ifị fịkufụma kwa Kyala Tāta na kwa Jesụ Kilisịtị, Umwana gwa Tāta, fyo fịsakujaga nanụswe mbwanalōlị na ndugano.
63001004	Nāli nulusekelo fị̄jo bo nāgịle abānīnụ bamo bịkwenda mbwanalōlị, bo papo Tāta atulagị̄le.
63001005	Lilino lelo gwe mwehe nịkukusūma, ukuti atugananege; ndịkukusị̄mbila ululagilo ulupya, lolị lo lulo twali nalo ulufụma mụ mbwandilo.
63001006	Ulwene ulugano lo ulu lụkuti twendege mụngomēlesyo syake; lulūlu lo lukomēlesyo bo mụmo mwapilikị̄le ukufụma mụ mbwandilo, ulwa kuti mwendege mụli lulo.
63001007	Namanga babonị̄ke abasyobị ba bị̄ngị nkị̄su, aba batịkwịtika ukuti Jesụ Kilisịtị alịsịle mụmmbili gwa būndu. Umụ̄ndu uju ịkujoba bosịsịsị, jo nsyobị kangi jo Ndabilana na Kilisịtị,
63001008	Amwịkētege jujumwe ukuti mụngịsakusyonāngaga isị mwalịjūlịle, lolị ukuti mwịsemwambịlilege ifịhōmbịgwa fị fị̄ngị ịtolo.
63001009	Gwesa uju ịkukīnda umpaka, uju atịkujamo ndumanyịsyo lwa Kilisịtị, jo akaja na Kyala. Lolị uju ịkuja mụ ndumanyịsyo, jo ali nabo bo babīli, nu Gwịse nu Mwana.
63001010	Linga umụ̄ndu jumo ịkwịsa kumyinụ, uju atịkutwala ulumanyịsyo bo lulūlu, jo mụngammwambililaga mụnyụ̄mba syinụ; kōpe nukumponịa mụngamponịaga;
63001011	namanga uju linga ịkuponanịa nagwe, jo ịkulilanịla nagwe īmbōmbo syake īmbị̄bị.
63001012	Napapo ndi nasyo nyịngị isya kubasị̄mbila pakalata nubwịno, lolị nịkusūbila ukwịsa kumyinụ, po nịsakujobaga nanụmwe bo tụkukētana mmāso, po ukuti ulusekelo lwitu lwịse lujege lupelelesye ịtolo.
63001013	Abāna ba ịlūmbugo unsalịgwa bịkukuponịa.
64001001	Jo une ne nkulu gwa kipānga nịkukusị̄mbila gwe Gajị, gwe nkamụ gwangu gwe nguganịle nalolị.
64001002	Gwe nnganịgwa gwangu, nịkukusūmila ukuti ujege kanụnụ mụli syosa, kangi ujege nkafụ ịtolo, bo papo umōjo gwako guli kanụnụ.
64001003	Namanga nasekị̄le fị̄jo bo abāmyitu bị̄sịle bịkusịsịmikisya ubwanalolị bwako, ena, bo papo bwịla kwenda mbwanalolị.
64001004	Sịkajako nasịmo isị̄ngị isya kusekesya ukusịkīnda isị nịkupilika, ukuti abānāngu bịkwenda mbwanalōlị.
64001005	Gwe nnganịgwa gwangu, syo sya busūbilịgwa isị kubabōmbela abāmyitu napa linga baje bahēsya.
64001006	Abāmyitu abo balusịsịmikị̄sye ulugano lwako nkyenị nkipānga; kwịsakubōmba kanụnụ linga kwịsakubatūla ukubasụmụsya ukuti bēndege īnjila jabo bo mụmo sịbagilị̄le kwa Kyala.
64001007	Namanga bāndịle īnjila jabo nkummbōmbela Kilisịtị kisịta kwambilila ubutūlị nabumo ukufụma kubāpānja.
64001008	Uswe fịkuti tubambililege aba bali bo bunobuno, ko kuti tujege babōmbanịsị mbwanalōlị.
64001009	Nakịsị̄mbị̄le ikipānga, lolị Ndyotịlefị uju ịganịle ukuja nkulūmba gwabo, jo atịkutwịtika uswe.
64001010	Po papo lelo bo nịsịle, nịsakusịkumbukaga īmbōmbo isị ịkubōmba, apa ịkutujoba amasyu amabị̄bị agā butūngulu; pamwanya pali sịsịsị ịkukāna ukubāmbilila abāmyitu, kangi ịkubakānịsya, ịkubasōsya nkipānga aba bịkulōnda ukubāmbilila.
64001011	Gwe nnganịgwa gwangu, ungabukōngaga ububị̄bị, lolị ubukōngege ubunụnụ. Uju ịkubōmba inụnụ jo afụmịle kwa Kyala; uju ịkubōmba īmbị̄bị jo akammbonamo Kyala.
64001012	Ndemetelịo ịkujobịgwa ubunụnụ nabāndu bōsa, bope nubwanalōlị bwake bụkunjoba ubunụnụ, nanụswe tụkunsịsịmikisya ubunụnụ kangi umēnye ukuti ulusịsịmịkisyo lwitu lo lwa nalōlị.
64001013	Ndi nasyo nyịngị isya kukusị̄mbila,
64001014	lolị nịkusūbila ukwaganịla nanụngwe mbibimbibi, po twịsakujobaga bo tụkukētana mmaso.
64001015	Ulutēngāno lujege nanụngwe. Abamanyānị bītu bịkukuponịa. Ubaponịege abamanyānị bītu, jumojumo unnjobēge īngamụ jake.
65001001	Jo une Jụ̄ta ne ntumwa gwa Jesụ Kilisịtị, kangi ne gwamyabo gwa Jakobụ, nịkubasị̄mbila mwe mụbilikilị̄gwe na Kyala, kangi mwe mụli ndugano lwa Kyala Ugwịse, mwe abūbatị̄le Jesụ Kilisịtị.
65001002	Ikisa, nulutēngāno, nulugano, fyo fịbālege mmyinụ.
65001003	Mwe baganịgwa bāngu, bo nịkwịjūla fị̄jo ukubasị̄mbila isya bupokị ubu bo bwitu twesa, po ndinkwaga kumbagị̄le ukubasị̄mbila isya kubasụkānịa, ukuti mụlulwilege ulwịtiko ulu bāpēlị̄gwe kamokēne ịtolo abị̄kemo.
65001004	Namanga abāndu bamo abị̄la. Kyala bị̄jị̄ngị̄sye mbutị̄tu ịtolo, aba basị̄mbilị̄gwe ukuja bā kujobịgwa ububị̄bị; abēne ilị̄pyana lya Kyala balisanwịsye ukuja lya kubōmbelamo ubulogwe, bịkunkāna Umwenefyosa uju ali jumojwene ịtolo, nu NTWA gwitu Jesụ Kilisịtị.
65001005	Lolị nịkulōnda ukubakūmbusya napapo linga mụsịmanyị̄le ngānị syosa, ukuti UNTWA ābasōsị̄sye abāndu bāke nkị̄su kya mw'Egịpịtị, lolị ulwanyụma alinkubapyụta abasịtakwịtika.
65001006	Bope nabāndumị aba bakapalīndilị̄le bunụnụ pabulagilị bwabo, lolị balinkubuleka ubujo bwabo, bo alinkubabīka mbupịnyịgwa bwa bwịlabwịla nkāti mụngị̄sị, ukwịsakufịka pị̄sịku ilịkulūmba ilya bulōngelo.
65001007	Bunobuno bope aba mụ Sotomụ na mụ Gomola, nabantwaja utu twabasyungutị̄le, ukufwana na balabala balinkubōmba isya bulogwe, balinkunyonywa ukulogwa nimịbili igīngi ịtolo; abēne bị̄pelịle ka kukētelamo, apa balinkukubilwa ndufụ̄ndo lwa mōto gwa bwịla.
65001008	Bunobuno bope bo bali na bababa, mbugogwanjosị bwabo, bịkuginyasya imịbili gyabo bābo, bịkubusyokela ubulagilị nukubatuka amahēlụ abāndumị.
65001009	Umwene lolị Mịkaelị ugwandumị unkulūmba, apa akānịkanaga nagwe Setano, apa bāgulwilaga ummbili gwa Mose, Mịkaelị akāgelịlepo napanāndi ukunndongela namahēlụ Setano, himma, lolị alinkuti: UNTWA jo akukemelege.
65001010	Abēne lolị abāndu bababa bịkusịtuka amahēlu nisị bakasịmanya, Lolị nkupelịgwa kwabo, basịlingenịe bo fị fịnyamāna ifịsịtamahala, syo bịkōnangikila sị̄syo.
65001011	Hītata kuli bābo, papo abāndu abo bakōngịle ulwendo lwa Kaịnị, bị̄tāgịle ịtolo mbusobị bwa Balamụ panōngwa ja fịhōmbịgwa; bapyụtiligwe lumo nagwe Kola nkusāmbuka kwake.
65001012	Abēne bịkwịpela mababye pafị̄ndu fya palusekelo lwa bumanyānị bwinụ, apa bịkulya nanụmwe kisịtalutēnde. Bịkwịtị̄ma bēne bali bo amabīngu amasịta fụla aga gịkukagịgwa nummbelo, bali bo imịpịkị ịtolo igi gilagēsye amānị imịsịta seke, igi gifwịle kabili, igi gikụ̄pwịke nimịsị.
65001013	Abāndu abo bali bo amajiga ga mụnyanja aga gasāmbwịke, aga gịkusōsya untotofụla gwa nyịsusyantu syabo. Bali bo īndōndwa isị sịsobịle īnjila jabo sịkwembēla, bo aba Kyala ābabīkị̄le īngị̄sị indị̄tu fị̄jo isịtakumalika sịku.
65001014	Bo aba Enokị, ugwa buhāno na bubili ukufụma pa Atamụ ākụngụlukaga ātigi: Kēta UNTWA ịsịle nifịlūndilo fya bị̄kemo bāke fị fị̄ngị ịtolo,
65001015	kukubalōnga bōsa, nukubatobesya bōsa abị̄la Kyala panōngwa ja mbōmbo syabo isị bābōmbịle, isya bwịla Kyala na panōngwa ja masyu gōsa amakāli aga banjobị̄le umwene abatulanōngwa abasịtakuntị̄la Kyala.
65001016	Abēne bo ba lwịbụnēsyo, kangi ba lwịlịlịsyo, bịkukōnga mụ mfịnyonyo fyabo; unndomo gwabo gukujoba isya lwịjụ̄mbiko. Bịkubīmikila abāndu mbūndu, ukuti bakabēge fịmo.
65001017	Lolị umwe mwe baganịgwa bāngu, mụgakumbukege amasyu aga gājobị̄gwe ịjolo nabatumịgwa ba NTWA gwitu Jesụ Kilisịtị.
65001018	Apa bababūlege ukuti: Nkabalilo ka kūsụlo, bịsakujangako abā lōbelo aba bịsakufịkōngaga ifịnyonyo fyabo fya bwịla Kyala.
65001019	Bo aba bịkupela īndapukano, aba bịkwịnogona sị sya nkị̄su ịtolo, bakaja nagwe Mbepo.
65001020	Lolị umwe mwe baganịgwa bāngu, mụjege mụnkwịjēnga palwịtiko lwinụ ulwịkemo. Mwịpụ̄tilege mmaka ga Mbepo Mwịkemo,
65001021	Mwịbīkege ndugano lwa Kyala, bo mụkukigụ̄lila ikisa kya NTWA gwitu Jesụ Kilisịtị, ukwakufịka kubūmị bwa bwịla.
65001022	Mụbapākisyege abāndu aba bịkwịlāmwa;
65001023	amụbapokege bamo bo mụkubanyaka ịtolo mmōto; abāngi bo mụbapākisyege ndutēnde, lolị mụgibēngege imyenda gyabo igi ginyasị̄gwe nummbili.
65001024	Umwene lolị uju amēnye ukubūbātila ukuti mụngagwaga, uju amēnye nukubabīka nkyenị mbukulūmba bwake mwe basịtamababye, mwe basangalufụ ịtolo,
65001025	kwa Kyala uju ali mwene ịtolo, Umpokị gwitu, mwa Jesụ Kilisịtị UNTWA gwitu. Jo ubukulūmba, nu ubusịsya, na amaka, nubulagilị fịjeko kumyake ifị ālinafyo ukufụma bo kikāli ukujako ikị̄su nalilino, nukwakufịka nakubusịtakumalika sịku na sịku. Amenị.
66001001	Isị syo nōngwa sya busetulị ubu Kyala ālimpēle Jesụ Kilisịtị. Ālimpēle ubusetulị bububu ukuti abanāngisyege ababōmbị bāke isị sịkuja pakuboneka nakalīnga. Kilisịtị ālintumịle ugwandumị gwake kukummbūla sịsịsị ummbōmbị gwake Johanị,
66001002	po papo Johanị alinkusịjoba pabwelụ syosa sịsịsị. Alinkusịsịmikisya ilịsyu lya Kyala nubwanalolị ubu bukunnjoba Jesụ Kilisịtị.
66001003	Nsangalufụ uju linga ịkubala amasyu gabukụngụlụka gagaga, kangi basangalufụ aba bịkugapilika nukusịbīka mụndụmbụla syabo isị sịsịmbigwemo mmasyu gagaga, namanga akabalilo kākwịsila sịsịsị kali kifụkị.
66001004	Johanị ịkufịsị̄mbila ifịpānga fịhāno na fịbili ifị fịli mw'Asịja ịkuti: Ilị̄pyana nulutēngāno fịjege nanụmwe ukufụma kwa Kyala uju alịko lilino, uju āliko bwịla naịjolo, uju nukwịsa ịsakwịsaga kangi; sịbasajege ni mbepo ịhāno naịbili isị sili nkyenị nkikota kyake kya butwa,
66001005	abasajege na Jesụ Kilisịtị unsịsịmikisị unsūbilịgwa, uju āli gwa kwanda ukusyuka ukufụma mmbufwe unndagilị gwa banyafyale bōsa bankị̄su mụno. Uju atuganịle, uju atwabwịle kubutulanōngwa bwitu, nubufwe bwake.
66001006	Uju atubunganịkịsye nkitāngālala kyake atupelịle bapụ̄tị ba Kyala Ugwịse. Jo apēgịgwege ubukulūmba na maka kisịta kuleka sịku. Amenị.
66001007	Keta ịkwịsilaga mmabingu, umụ̄ndu gwesa ịsakummbonaga. Bope nāba bālinndasịle bịsakummbonaga; kangi nifịkolo fyosa fya nkisu fisakulilaga mbusụlụmanịe na nndutēnde bo ịkwịsa. E, nalolị bo sịsakujaga.
66001008	Une Joune A, joune O, (joune Bwandilo, joune Bumalikilo), bo ịkuja UNTWA kyala ugwamakagosa, uju alịko lilino, uju āliko na ịjolo, uju kangi ịsakwịsaga.
66001009	Une ne Johanị ne nkamụ gwinụ, ne nndīlanịsị mwịnīnụ mwa Jesụ ubufịndang'oma ni ngubilo isị sịkubị̄sila aba bali nkitāngālala kyake. Nābīkị̄gwe pa lusūngo lwa Patịmo kunōngwa ja kulūmbilila ilịsyu lya Kyala nukunsịsịmikisya Jesụ.
66001010	Pị̄sịku lya NTWA Mbepo ālinyị̄sị̄le nndinkupilika kūnyụma kumyangu ilịsyu ilịkulūmba, ukufwana kulila kwa ngangabwịte.
66001011	Lilinkuti: Usịmbēge mwa Kalata syosa isị kusịbona usịtumege kufịpānga fịhāno na fịbili; ikya mw'Efesị ni kya mụ Sịmịlịna, ni kya mụ Pelịgamụ, ni kya mụ Tyatịla, ni kya mụ Salịndị, nikya mụ Fịlatelịfịja ni kya mụ Laotịkịja.
66001012	Po papo ndinkusyụtuka ukuti nunkēte uju ājobaga nanịne, ndinkufịbona ifịkolelanyāle fya sahabu fịhāno nafịbili,
66001013	pakāti pali fịlafịla kālipo akāndu kamo aka kābonekaga ngāti mụ̄ndu uju afwele unselekesye ugu gwafịkịle pāsi mmalundi gāke, kangi ị̄pịnyịle umpāngo gwa sahabu pakipāmbaga.
66001014	Īnywịlị syake syali nyēlụ swē ukufwana bo amasapa pamo ukufwana bo īngala, amāso gāke gāmụlikaga ukufwana mōto,
66001015	amalūndi gāke gabịkukaga ukufwana kyela ikibūngu iki kyengusịgwe kyelusigwe, ilịsyu lyake lyobelaga ukufwana misị amị̄ngị (nndūlilo.)
66001016	Ākolị̄le īndōndwa ịhāno naịbili nkiboko kyake ikị̄līlo, ulūbo lwa bwembe kōsakōsa ulūgị lulinkusōka nkufụma nkanwa mmyake. Ikyenị kyake kyamụlikaga ngāti ịsuba bo lili pantu.
66001017	Bo nummbwene ndinkwenda nukugwa pāsi mmalūndi mmyake ukufwana mụ̄ndu uju afwịle, alinkubīka ikiboko kyake ikị̄līlo pamyangu alinkuti: Ungatetemaga. Une joune ne Ntasị joune ne Gwakūsụlo,
66001018	kangi joune ne mūmị; buno nāfwịle lelo lilino ndi mūmị ngwakufịkaga kubusịtakumalika sịku nasịku nngolị̄le nifị̄gulilo fya bufwe nifya kubusyuka.
66001019	Sịmbaga lelo isị kukēta, isị sịlịko lilino na isị sịkwịsaga kūnyụma.
66001020	Isya mbutị̄tu isya ndōndwa ịhāno naịbili isị gwasịbwene nkiboko kyangu ikị̄līlo, nisya fịkolelanyāle fya sahabu fịhāno nafịbili syo isị; īndōndwa ịhāno naịbili bo bandumị ba fịpānga fịhano nafịbili, ifịkolelanyāle fịhāno nafịbili fyo fipānga fịhāno na fịbili.
66002001	Kugwandumị gwa kipānga kya mw'Efesị usịmbēge utigi: Aga go masyu aga gafụmịle kuli uju ịkukolela īndōndwa ịhāno naịbili nkiboko kyake ikị̄līlo, uju ịkwenda pakāti pafịkolelanyāle fya sahabu fịhāno nafịbili,
66002002	ịkuti: Nsịmēnye īmbōmbo syako, nndumēnye nulwịjūlo lwako nubukịfụ bwako. Ngumēnye ukuti ukabagila ukwangala na bāndu ababị̄bị nukuti ubagelịle aba bịkwịjoba ukuja batumịgwa ngīmba mma, ubakolịle ubutūngulu.
66002003	Uli mfịsalyojo, ukubị̄lwe panōngwa jangu, lolị utikufwa umōjo.
66002004	Lolị isị ngīndēne nanụngwe syo isị ukāngana bo mụno gwalinganị̄le ulutasị.
66002005	Kumbuka lelo mụno gwajīlị̄le bo ukāli ukugwa; pinduka ubōmbēge isị gwabombaga pakwanda. Linga kukāna, nịsakukwịsila nēnde nukusosyapo ikikolelanyāle, kyako apa kyali; linga kusị̄ta ukupīnduka.
66002006	Lolị isị utalwịsye syo syakusịbēnga īmbōmbo sya Banịkolaịtị isị nanịne nsịbēngịle.
66002007	Uju linga ali nimbulukutu jo alīpilikaga isị Mbepo ịkufịbūla ifịpānga! Uju linga ịkubutola ubwịte jo nịsakummwitikisyaga nkulya īseke sya mpịkị gwa būmị ugu gubyalịgwe mụ Nngūnda gwa Kyala.
66002008	Ugwandumị gwa kipānga kya mụ Sịmịlịna jo unsịmbilege utigi: Iji jo ndumị iji jifụmịle kuli uju jo Ntasị kangi jo Gwakūsụlo, uju āfwịle kangi āsyukịle,
66002009	ịkuti: Mbumēnye ubukamandanịgwa bwako, mbumēnye nubulōndo bwako (lolị ukujoba isyanalōlị uli nkabị); Nngamēnye na mahēlu aga bịkukutuka aba bịkwịjoba ukuja Bajụ̄ta bo bakaja Bajụ̄ta; abēne, kilūndilo kya setano.
66002010	Ungatị̄laga syosa isị kujapakukubilwa. Ukēte! Umōhesị ịkuja pakubagela abị̄nīnụ bamo ịkujapakubị̄galila nnyụ̄mba jabannyololo; ubukamandanịgwa bwinụ bwịsakwegaga amasịku kalōngo. Mụnyịtikege ịtolo napapo linga sịkutwala ubufwe, po nịsakubapaga īngiga ja būmị.
66002011	Po lelo linga mụli nimbulukutu mụlīpilikaga isị Mbepo ịkufịbūla ifịpānga! Aba bịkutola ubwịte bo ubufwe bwa bubili butị̄sakubonangaga.
66002012	Ugwandumị gwa kipānga kya mụ Pelịgamụ jo unsịmbilege utigi: Aga go masyu aga gafụmịle kuli uju ali nulūbo ulūgị ulwabwembe kōsa kōsa.
66002013	Nkumēnye kuno ujēngịle, kuno kilịko ikikota kya butwa kya setano; ujūmilị̄le īngamụ jangu, ndwịtiko lwako kumyangu ukānịle ukūndeka une napakabalilo aka Antịpasị unsịsịmikisị gwangu unsūbilịgwa āgogelịgwaga mmyinụ mụla, mụno ajēngịle setano.
66002014	Lolị sịlịpo sịmo nāndi isị sịmbelị̄le ukukubēnga; balịko bamo nkāti mmyinụ aba bịkukōnga īmanyịsyo sya Balamụ, uju ālimmanyị̄sye Balakị isya kubapīsanịa abany'Ịsịlaelị, ukubapefya ukuti balyege amakemo ga gyabakyala nukubōmba isya bulogwe.
66002015	Bo bunobuno kangi balịmo nkāti mmyinụ abāndu aba bịkukōnga īmanyịsyo sya Banịkolaịtị.
66002016	Oko lelo pindukaga! Linga kusị̄ta ukupīnduka, āngwịsa kumyako nakalīnga kukulwa nabo abāndu abo nulūbo ulufụma nkanwa mmyangu.
66002017	Uju linga ali nimbulukutu jo alīpilikaga isị Mbepo ịkufịbūla ifịpānga. Uju linga ịkubutola ubwịte jo nịkunnjabilaga mana gwa kubutị̄tu. Kangi nịsakumpaga ilị̄bwe ilyelụ ili lisị̄mbị̄gwepo īngamụ īmbya iji najumo akajimanya, ajimēnye mwene jūjo ịkupēgwa.
66002018	Kangi ugwandumị gwa kipānga kya Tyatịla unsịmbilege utigi: Amasyu ga Mwana gwa Kyala, uju amāso gāke gịkufwana ndapi sya mōto kangi uju amalūndi gāke gikubikuka ukufwana kyela ikibūngu iki kyelusịgwe,
66002019	ikuti: Nsịmēnye īmbōmbo syako, nndumēnye nulugano lwako, nulwịtiko lwako, nububōmbelị bwako nubufịsalyojo bwako. Mmēnye ukuti lilino kubōmba fịjo ukukīnda ulutasị.
66002020	Lolị isị, syoisị sịkumbelela ukukubēnga: Kukịba ukwangala nunkịkulu Jesebeli uju ịkwịjoba ukuja ntumịgwa gwa Kyala. Mbumanyịsị bwake ababōmbị bāngu ịkubasobekesya kumbōmbo sya bulogwe na kukulya amakemo ga gyabakyala.
66002021	Numpēle akabalilo ukuti apīndukege lolị atịkulōnda ukupīnduka kumbị̄bị syake.
66002022	Fyobene lelo āngunsopaga pakitala apa umwene nāba bịkulogwa nagwe bịsakuja nndukubilo ulusịsya. Nịsakubōmbaga sịsịsị linga batịkupīnduka, kūnyalị isị babōmbịle nagwe.
66002023	Nịsakubagogaga na bānāke po lelo ifịpānga fyosa fịsakūmanyaga ukuti une joune ne ngusyenēsya īndụmbụla ni nyịnogono sya bāndu. Nisakunhōmbaga jumo jumo ukukōngana naisị ābōmbaga.
66002024	Lolị mwe bāngi mwe mụli mwa Tyatịla mwe mụkalukōnga ulumanyịsyo ulubị̄bị, mwe mụkamanyịla isị abāngi bịkusịjoba ukuja syo sya mmbutị̄tu sya setano isya mbusolofụ. Nịkubabūla ukuti ndịsakubatwikaga untwalo ugūngi nagumo.
66002025	Lolị fịkuti mụsyumīlilege fịjo isị mụli nasyo ukwịsakufịka papo nịsakwịsilaga.
66002026	Uju ịkubutola ubwịte, uju ịkukịba ukubōmba isị nịganịle mpaka kubumalīkisyo, jo nịsakumpaga amaka, amaka galagala nanịne nālyambilị̄le ukufụma kwa Tāta, ukuja nndagilị gwa bāpānja,
66002027	ịsakubalagilaga ningịlị ja Kyela, ịsakubabogojolanịaga bo īndeko;
66002028	kangi nịsakumpaga ulutōndwa lwa lubūnju (Kipandabusịku).
66002029	Uju linga īmbulukutu alinasyo jo alīpilikaga isị Mbepo ịkufịbula ifịpānga.
66003001	Ugwandumị gwa kipānga kya Salịndị jo unsịmbilege utigi: Ị̄ji jo ndumị iji jifụmịle kuli uju ali ni mbepo ịhāno naịbili nindōndwa ịhāno naịbili sya Kyala ịkuti: Nsịmēnye isị kubōmba; Mmēnye ukuti kujobịgwa ukuja mūmị napapo uli mfwe.
66003002	Buno buno lelo, lēmbuka ubakasyege nabāngi aba basyele aba bịkulōnda ukufwa. Namanga nāgịle ukuti īmbōmbo syako sịkāli sịkafịkapo pabupelelesye nkyenị mwa Kyala.
66003003	Ukūmbukege lelo isị gwamanyịsị̄gwe naisị gwapilị̄ke; usịkōngege upīndukege. Linga utịkulēmbuka, nịsakukwịsilaga bo unhījị, utịsakukamanyaga na kabalilo ka kwịsila une.
66003004	Lolị balịmo bamo banāndi mụ Salịndị umo aba bakaginyasyamo imyenda gyabo. Bababo bo babagị̄le ukusyungutila pamopēne nanịne bo bafwele imyenda imyelụ.
66003005	Uju linga ịkubutola ubwịte jo ịsakufwikịgwaga bunobuno imyenda imyelụ, jo ndịsakōmolaga īngamụ jake mwakalata gwa būmị; nịsakujijobaga īngamụ jake pamāso pa Tāta na nkyenị mmbāndumị.
66003006	Uju linga ali nimbulukutu jo alīpilikaga isị Mbepo ịkufịbūla ifịpānga.
66003007	Kugwandumị gwa kipānga kya mụ Fịlatelịfịja usịmbēge utigi: Aga go masyu aga gafụmịle kumwịkemo kangi ugwanalolị, uju akolị̄le ikị̄gulilo kya Ndabịtị, linga ịgwịle ulwịgị, akajako najumo uju abagị̄le ukulwịgala, linga alwịgēle akajako ugwakwịgula.
66003008	Mmēnye isị mụkubōmba; Mmēnye ukuti mụli namaka manāndi; lolị pope mụsịkọlịle īndagilo syangu, mụlikōngịle ilịsyu lyangu kangi mụjị̄tị̄ke īngamụ jangu.
66003009	Mụkupilika! Ikilūndilo kya banyasētano aba bịkwịjoba bēne ukuja Bajụ̄ta, ngīmba basyobị kyo nịkukitumaga kumyinụ kukugwa ulupị mmalūndi mmyinụ.
66003010	Papo mụlukōngịle ululagilo lwangu ulwa kuja nubufịndang'oma, nanịne nịsakubūbātilaga nkabalilo ka butolwe ubu bụkukịsilaga ikị̄su kyosa kukubagela bōsa aba bali pakị̄su.
66003011	Une ngujapakwịsa kisịta kukābila; mūmililege fịjo aka mụli nako ukuti najumo angapokaga īngiga jīnụ.
66003012	Uju linga ịkutola ubwịte jo nịsakumpelaga mbānda ja nyụ̄mba īnyị̄kemo ja Kyala gwangu mo atịsakusokangamo nasịku; kangi nịsakusị̄mbaga pa kyenị kyake īngamụ ja Kyala gwangu ni ngamụ ja kāja ka Kyala gwangu, Jelụsalemụ umpya, akāja aka kisakusụlụkaga ukufụma kumwanya kwa Kyala gwangu. Kangi nisakubasịmbangapo īngamụ jangu īmbya.
66003013	Uju linga ali nimbulukutu jo alīpilikaga isị Mbepo ịkufịbūla ifịpānga lelo!
66003014	Ugwandumị gwa kipānga kya Laotịkịja jo unsịmbilege utigi: Iji jo ndumị iji jifụmịle kumyake uju īngamụ jake jo Amenị. Umwene jo nsịsịmikisị unsūbiligwa kangi ugwanalolị, uju jo bwandilo bwa fịpelịgwa fyosa ifị Kyala apelịle,
66003015	ịkuti: Nsịmēnye īmbōmbo syako; Mmēnye ukuti ukaja ntalalifụ kangi ukaja mpyu. Pāki linga gwali ntalalifụ pamo linga gwali mpyu, po lolị!
66003016	Lolị apa uli mfụgụtifụ ịtolo ubutalalifu ukaja nabo bope ubupyu ukaja nabo po āngukuswaga ukufụma nkanwa mmyangu.
66003017	Ugwe kwịjoba kuti: Une ndi nkabị, nngapondwa nafịmo, fịkajapo ifị mfụ̄mbịlwe. Lolị ukị̄bona ukuja gwe nnjwelufụ, gwe mpelakisa, gwe nndōndo, gwe mfwamaso kangi gwe uli bufụ̄la!
66003018	Ngukusoka ukuti gūle sahabu kumyangu, sahabu uju ēngusị̄gwe mwịtēnde lya mōto ko kuti gwịpelege nkabị nalolị. Kangi gūlege imyenda gya kufwala ukuti gibusịgege ubufụ̄la bwako bwa sonị. Gūlege ni mbōndanịa ja kwịpaka mmaso ukuti ukētege.
66003019	Une ngubasoka nukubafụ̄nda bōsa aba mbaganịle. Gwijulege lelo upīndukege.
66003020	Keta, nīmịle pakifịgo ngukụng'ụnda kulwịgị; uju linga ịkuti nukupilika ilịsyu lyangu ịkuti nukunyigulila kukifịgo jo nịkwingilaga mmyake ndyege nagwe ifị̄ndu jope alyege nanịne.
66003021	Aba babutolịle ubwịte bo nịsakubapaga pabutugasanịo nanịne pakikota kyangu kya butwa, bo apa nanịne nndolịle ubwịte kangi ndūgasenịe na Tāta pakikota kyake kyabutwa.
66003022	Uju linga īmbulukutu alinasyo jo alīpilikaga isi Mbepo ịkufịbūla ifịpānga.
66004001	Lelo po papo ndinkukēta ndinkwaga ikifịgo kị̄gwịke kumwanya. Ilịsyu lya kwanda ili nālipilị̄ke bo lịkujoba kumyangu ukufwana ngangabwịte lyatịle: Fyuka gwịse kuno ngunāngisye isị sịkubonekaga pānyụma pali isị.
66004002	Nakalīnga ịtolo Mbepo alinkunyịsila. Ndinkwaga kumwanya kilịko ikikota kyabutwa iki atugēsyepo umụ̄ndu,
66004003	uju ikyenị kyake kyalāngalaga ukufwana ịbwe lya alimasị na salityu; kangi ndinkwaga ululānga lukisyungutile ikikota kya butwa iki kyabonekaga ukufwana jo simalakiti.
66004004	Kangi ndinkufịbona ifịkota fya butwa ifịnāndi amalōngo mabili na fịna fịkisyembetelị̄le ikikota kyabutwa. Pafịkota fịfịfị bālitugelepo abalōngosị amalōngo mabili na bāna aba bāfwele imyenda imyelụ ningiga sya sahabu kuntu.
66004005	Ukufụma nkikota kyabutwa kikīki filinkusoka ifịmwekụ fya njasị nukutajanịka kwa njasị, nukulụndụma. Nkyenị nkikota kya butwa ndinkwaga sịkwaka ingōka sya mōto ịhāno na ịbili; sịsịsị syali syo mbepo sya Kyala ịhāno naịbili.
66004006	Kangi nkyenị nkikota kyabutwa mụlinkuboneka ukufwana nyanja ja māngalāsị, lyaliti ịbwe lya kililila. Mumbafu syosa sya kikota kya butwa kikīki fyakisyungutị̄le ifịpelịgwa fyabūmị fịna ifị fịli namāso kōsakōsa nkyenị nakūnyụma.
66004007	Ikyabūmị ikyakwanda ndinkwaga kifwene ningalamụ, ikyabubili kyafwene ngāmbaku, ikyabutatu kyali ni kyenị bo ikya mụ̄ndu, ikya buna kyaliti ịpūla ili lipulụlwịke.
66004008	Kimo kimo, mfyabūmị fịna fịfịfị kyalinamapiko ntandatu, kangi namāso mōsa mụnyụma na nkāti. Pamụ̄sị na pakilo fịkātusyaga ukwimba fịlinkuti: Mwịkemo, mwịkemo, mwịkemo jo NTWA Kyala Gwamakagosa, uju āliko ịjolo, uju alịko lilino kangi uju ịkwịsaga.
66004009	Ifyabūmị fyo fịna fịfịfị fyimbaga inyimbo sya kuntụ̄fya nukummwimika nukunngwila ulupị uju atūgēle pakikota kya butwa, uju alịko bwịla ịtolo nakubusịtakumalika sịku,
66004010	abalōngosị amalōngo mabili na bāna balabala balinkwịlịgịta pāsi nkyenị mụli uju atūgēle pakikota kyabutwa balinkunngụ̄ndamịla uju alịko bwịla ịtolo kisịta kumalika sịku. Balinkutāga pāsi īngiga syabo nkyenị nkikota kya butwa bo bịkwimba bịkuti:
66004011	Ubagị̄le ugwe, gwe NTWA gwitu Kyala, ukwambilila ubukulūmba, nulwimiko, na maka. Papo ugwe gwapelịle fyosa, mbwịgane bwako fyapelị̄gwe nukupēligwa ubūmị.
66005001	Po papo lelo ndinkummbona kalata nkiboko ikị̄līlo kya uju atūgēsye pakikota kya butwa; kalata jujuju āsị̄mbị̄gwe nkāti na mụnyụma kangi ākolekelị̄gwe nifịkolekelo fịhāno na fịbili.
66005002	Kangi ndinkummbona ugwandumị ugwamaka ịkulāta ukukōlela ịkuti: Jwanị abagị̄le ukwigula ifịkolekelo nukubālula kalata uju?
66005003	Lolị akālipo najumo kumwanya pamo pakị̄su pamo kūsi kukị̄su uju ābagị̄le ukubālula kalata nukukēta nkāti.
66005004	Ndinkulila fịjo papo akalyagị̄gwe najumo uju ābagị̄le ukubālula kalata uju pamo ukukēta nkāti.
66005005	Lelo po papo jumo mmbalōngosị bala alinkujoba nanịne alinkuti: Ungalilaga. Keta! Ngalamụ umfụma nkikolo kya Jụ̄ta, Nsi gwa Ndabịtị, abutolịle ubwịte, jo abagị̄le ukwigula ifịkolekelo fịhano nafịbili nukubālula kalata jujuju.
66005006	Kangi pakāti na pakāti pa kikota kya butwa nifịpelịgwa ifyumị fịna fịla nkāti mmbalōngosị bala ndinkummbona Kang'ōsị īmịle ukufwana abōlị̄gwe, ali nimbēmbe ịhāno naịbili kangi namāso mahāno namabili, aga syali syo mbepo ịhāno naịbili sya Kyala isị syatumị̄gwe nkị̄su kyosa.
66005007	Kang'ōsị alinkubūka alinkwakwega kalata ukufụma nkiboko ikị̄līlo kya uju ịkutūgasya pakikota kyabutwa.
66005008	Lelo bo ēgịle kalata, ifyabūmị fịna fịla na balōngōsị bāna bala balinkugwa pāsi nkyenị mwa Kang'ōsị. Jumo jumo āli nikisāngo ni bakụlị sya sahabu isị syalị̄swile ifyakufụ̄kisya; ifyakufụ̄kisya fịfịfị syo nyị̄pụ̄to sya bāndu ba Kyala;
66005009	po papo balinkwimba ulwimbo ulupya balinkuti: Ubagị̄le ugwe ukwega kalata nukwịgula ifịkolekelo fyake. Namanga ugwe gwagogị̄gwe ummụ̄lị̄le Kyala niịlopa lyako abāndu bafịkolo fyosa, kangi abānjobelo syosa.
66005010	Ubapelịle ukuja banyafyale, ubapelịle ukuja bapụ̄tị bakummbōmbela Kyala gwitu, bịkwịpelaga balagilị pakị̄su.
66005011	Kangi ndinkwaga ngupilika ilịsyu lya bandumị aba bāli mwa baelufụ na bāmilịonị ubwịngị. Bākisyembetelị̄le ikikota kya butwa, nifya būmị fila na balōngōsị bala,
66005012	balinkwimba mwịsyu ilịkulūmba balinkuti. Ju Kang'ōsị uju āgogị̄gwe jo abagị̄le ukwambilila ubulagilị, ubukabị, amahala, namaka, ulwimiko, ubukulūmba nu lutụ̄fyo!
66005013	Kangi ndinkupilika ifịpelịgwa fyosa fya kumwanya, nifya pakị̄su, ifya mmbusyuka, nifya mụnyanja fyosa ifyabūmị fya mfị̄su fyosa fịkwimba fịkuti: Ulutụ̄fyo, ulwimiko, ubukulūmba namaka, fyo fịjege kuli uju ịtūgēsye pakikota kyabutwa, ju Kang'ōsị ukwakufịka nakubusịtakumalika sịku nasịku.
66005014	Ifyabūmị fịna fịla fịlinkwamụla fịlinkuti: Amenị! Abalōngosị bala balinkuti nalịgịtị pāsi balinkummbụngụlụkila.
66006001	Lelo po papo ndinkummbona Kang'ōsị bo ịkwịgula ikikolekelo kya kwanda mwa fịhāno nafịbili fịla, kangi ndinkupilika ikyabūmị kimo mwa fịna fịla kịkujoba mwịsyu ili lyafwene njasị kịkuti: Ịsaga.
66006002	Ndinkukēta ndinkwaga falāsị nyēlụ. Uju ālitogịlepo ākolị̄le ubupīndo kangi āpēgị̄gwe īngiga. Alinkusụmụka bo nndambikị ukubūka kukufịtola ifị̄su.
66006003	Po papo Kang'ōsị alinkwịgula ikikolekelo kya bubili, po ndinkwenda nukupilika bo kịkujoba ikyabūmị kyabubili kịkuti: Ịsaga!
66006004	Īfalāsị ijīngi, īfụbīfụ, jilinkusokoka. Uju alị̄togịlepo āpēgị̄gwe amaka gakutwala ubufwalanganịfu pakị̄su, ukuti abāndu bagoganege. Āpēgị̄gwe ulūbo ulunywamụ.
66006005	Kang'ōsị alinkwịgula ikikolekelo kya butatu; ndinkupilika bo ikyabūmị kya butatu kịkuti: Ịsaga! Ndinkukēta ndinkwaga falāsi ndị̄tu. Uju ịtogịlepo akolị̄le ikyakupimila ubusịto nkiboko kyake.
66006006	Po papo ndinkupilika ukufwana ịsyu lịkufụma nkāti mfyabūmị fịna fịla lịkuti: Akapapike kamo ka nganụ pa lutalama lumo! Utupapike tutatu twa malesị palutalama lumo! Loli komma ukōnānga īnyēmba nu bwalwa bwa māfị̄lu.
66006007	Lelo po papo Kang'ōsị alinkwịgula ikikolekelo kya buna; ndinkwenda nukukipilika ikyabūmị kya buna kịkuti: Ịsaga!
66006008	Ndinkukēta ndinkwaga falāsị mbuba. Uju alị̄togịlepo īngamụ jake āli jo Bufwe. Busyuka alinkunkōnga kūnyụma pa bupị̄pị nagwe. Bāpēgị̄gwe amaka ga kukilagila ikijabo kimo mfịjabo fịna fya kị̄su ifị fifwene ịtolo, ukubagoga abāndu ni ngwego, ninjala, nimbūngo, kangi nifịnyamāna fya nndị̄su.
66006009	Po lelo kangi Kang'ōsị alinkwịgula ikikolekelo kya buhāno. Po papo pāsi pakigemo kya kwịkemēkesyapo ndinkugibona imịsyungūlu gya bāndu aba bāgogị̄gwe kunōngwa ja kufụmụsya ilịsyu lya Kyala nukulisisịmịkisya nndwịtiko.
66006010	Balinkulāta ukukụ̄ta balinkuti: Gwe NTWA Gwamakagosa, gwe mwikemo, gwe gwanalōlị! Kasyele bule akabalilo ka kubalōngela ugwe abāndu ba pakị̄su nukubabụkisya īmbị̄bị syabo kunōngwa ja kutugoga uswe?
66006011	Jumo jumo alinkupēgịgwa unselekesye umwelụ balinkubūlịgwa ukutūsya panāndi tāsị mpaka papo bōsa ababōmbị bị̄nābo na bāmyabo bịsakugogelịgwaga bo apa bāgogị̄gwe abēne.
66006012	Po papo ndinkummbona Kang'ōsị ịkwịgula ikikolekelo kya ntandatu. Ndinkunyomoka akasenyenda akakulūmba kị̄sịle, ilị̄suba lilinkwịna, lilinkufwana kigụnila ikitị̄tu, umwesị gulinkwanduka lōsa, gulinkwịpela mfụbīfụ ukufwana ịlopa.
66006013	Īndōndwa sịlinkusatuka pāsi ukufwana seke sya nkuju isị sịkāli ukubifwa, isị sịsatwịke ukufụma mụmpịkị bo ummbelo gwamaka gugujugīsị̄sye umpịkị;
66006014	umpālānga gulinkujōnga ukufwana bo ilị̄palapāta lya kalata apa umụ̄ndu ịkulinịenga, ifyamba nisūngo fyasamịsị̄gwe mmbujo bwabo.
66006015	Lelo po papo abanyafyale bankị̄su na mafụmụ na balongōsị ba bwịte nabakabị na bāmaka, numụ̄ndu gwesa ịtolo, untumwa numwabuke, balinkwịbīlila mụmbako sya mabwe ga mfyamba,
66006016	balinkukōlela kufyamba na kunyālabwe balinkuti: Amụtugwilege mụtufịse ukuti tungakibonaga ikyenị kya uju atūgēsye pakikota kyabutwa, mụtufịse na kungalalisị sya Kang'ōsị;
66006017	namanga bwịsịle ubusịku ubukulūmba bwa ngalalisị syabo, aịkujangapo jwanị unkịfụ ugwakufụ̄fụlila?
66007001	Kūnyụma kuli sịsịsị ndinkubabona abāndumị bāna bīmịle pāngụto sya kị̄su syo ịna bagikolị̄le kūko imịbelo gya kị̄su gyo mịna ukuti ummbelo nagumo gungakụlaga pakị̄su pamo panyanja pamo mmịpịkị.
66007002	Kangi ndinkummbona ugwandumị ujūngi bo ịkufụma kubusōkelo akolị̄le ikikolekelo kya Kyala umūmị. Alinkulāta ukubakōlela abāndumị bāna bala, aba Kyala ābapēle amaka ga kōnānga ikị̄su ni nyanja.
66007003	Ātịle: Komma ukukyonānga ikị̄su, pamo īnyanja pamo imịpịkị mpaka papo ababōmbị ba Kyala gwitu twịsakubabīkaga ikịmanyịlo pafyenị fyabo nikikolekelo.
66007004	Ndinkwenda nukubūlịgwa ukuti aba bābīkị̄gwe ikimanyịlo pafyenị fyabo nikikolekelo kya Kyala, ubwịngị bāli baelufụ mịa jumo na malōngo mana nabāna. Bāfụmịle mfịkolo fyo kalōngo nafịbili fya Ịsịlaelị.
66007005	Nkikolo kya Jụ̄ta babīkị̄gwe ikimanyịlo abāndu baelufụ kalōngo na babili (12,000). Nkikolo kya Lubenị baelufụ kalōngo na babili (12,000). Nkikolo kya Gatị baelufụ kalōngo nababili (12,000).
66007006	Nkikolo kya Aselị baelufụ kalōngo nababili (12,000). Nkikolo kya Nafụtalị baelufụ kalōngo nababili (12,000). Nkikolo kya Manasị baelufụ kalōngo nababili (12,000).
66007007	Nkikolo kya Sịmyonị baelufụ kalōngo nababili (12,000). Nkikolo kya Lebị baelufụ kalōngo na babili (12,000). Nkikolo kya Ịsakalị baelufụ kalōngo nababili (12,000).
66007008	Nkikolo kya Sabulonị baelufụ kalōngo nababili (12,000). Nkikolo kya Josefụ baelufụ kalōngo nababili (12,000). Nkikolo kya Benjamịnị baelufụ kalōngo nababili (12,000).
66007009	Pānyụma pali sịsịsị ndinkukēta ndinkwaga kilūndilo kya bāndu ikikulūmba fịjo akālipo najumo uju amēnye ukubabala abāndu bōsa bala! Bāfụmịle nnduko lōsa lwabāndu, na mfị̄su fyosa namfịkolo fyosa na mụnjobelo syosa, balyimịle nkyenị nkikota kya butwa na nkyenị mwa Kang'ōsị bo bafwele imyenda imyelụ nukukolela utusāmba twa tugị̄ndwa mmaboko.
66007010	Balinkukōlela balinkuti: Ubupokị bwitu bụkufụma kwa Kyala gwitu uju ịtūgēsye pakikota kya butwa, bụkufụma na kwa Kang'ōsị!
66007011	Abāndumị bōsa bālyimịle bākisyungutị̄le ikikota kya butwa, nabakulu ba kipānga nafịfyabūmị fịna fịla. Balinkwịlịgịta pāsi nkyenị nkikota kyabutwa balinkummbụngụlụkila Kyala,
66007012	balinkuti: Amenị! Ulutụ̄fyo, nubukulūmba, nukugwa ulupị, nulwimiko nubutolị na maka fyake Kyala gwitu bwịla na kubusịtakumalika sịku! Amenị!
66007013	Jumo mmbakulūmba bala alindālūsịsye ātile: Bo bōbāni abāndu aba bafwele imịselekesye imyelụ, bafụmịle kūgu?
66007014	Une ndịkwamụla ndinkuti: Ngabamanya Malafyale, ubamēnye jujugwe. Ālīmbūlịle ātịle: Bababa bo bāndu aba baponịle bēndịle mụngubilo īngulūmba. Basụkịle imyenda gyabo, bagyelwịsye niilopa lya Kang'osi.
66007015	Jo nōngwa iji bịkwima nkyenị nkikota kya butwa kya Kyala nukummbōmbela pamụ̄sị na pakilo nnyụ̄mba jake īnyị̄kemo. Uju ịtūgēsye pakikota kyabutwa ịsakubūbātilaga.
66007016	Abēne jitịsakwandisyamo ukubaluma injala, batịsakwandisyamo nukūmilwa amīsi, ilị̄suba nubupyu ubūngị ubukali butịsakubōkyaga,
66007017	papo Kang'ōsị uju ali pakāti pakikota kya butwa ịsakujaga jo ntị̄mị gwabo, ịsakubatalukisyaga kunyị̄buko sya mīsi gabūmị. Jope Kyala ịsakubapyasila amāsosị gōsa mmāso gābo.
66008001	Lelo bo Kang'ōsị bo ịgwịle ikikolekelo kya buhāno na bubili kumwanya kwamyekịle ilakika amalōngo matatu.
66008002	Po ndinkubabona abāndumị bahāno na babili aba bịkwima nkyenị mwa Kyala bịkupēgwa īngangabwịte ịhāno na ịbili.
66008003	Alinkwịsa ugwandumị ujūngi uju ali nikyela kya sahabu mụno fyalịmo ifyakufụ̄kisya, alinkwakwima nkyenị nkigemo kya kwịkemēkesyapo iki kili nkyenị nkikota kya butwa. Āpēgị̄gwe ifyakufụ̄kisya fịfịngi ifyakongelapo pamwanya panyịpụ̄to sya bāndu ba Kyala bōsa alinkufịtwala pa kigemo kya sahabu ikyakwịkemekesyapo iki kili nkyenị nkikota kya butwa.
66008004	Ilyosị lya fya kufụ̄kisya lilinkufyukila lumo ninyị̄pụ̄to sya bāndu ba Kyala ukufụma mmaboko ga gwandumị uju ālyimịle nkyenị mwa Kyala.
66008005	Lelo po papo ugwandumị alinkwega ikyela kila mụno fyajaga ifyakufụ̄kisya, alinkwịsusya mụmo umōto ugu gwafụmịle nkigemo kyakwikemekesyapo, alinkukitaga pakị̄su. Lelo po papo kulinkwịsa ukulụ̄ndụma nukutajanịka kwa njasị, ni fịmwekụ fya njasị na kasenyēnda.
66008006	Lelo abāndumị bahāno nababili bala ningangabwịte ịhāno naịbili sịla balinkwịtendekesya ukuja pakusịkuba.
66008007	Ugwandumị ugwakwanda ākubịle īngangabwịte jake. Po papo īfụla jamabwe numōto ifị fyalyongēne niịlopa, fịlinkōnekela pakị̄su. Ikijabo kimo kya kị̄su mfịjabo fyake fịtatu ifị fịfwene ubunywamụ kyakosị̄gwe, ikibụgụtila kimo kya mịpịkị mfịbụgụtila fyake fịtatu ifị fịfwene nilị̄su lyosa ilị̄bisi fyapị̄le.
66008008	Po lelo ugwandumị ugwa bubili alinkwenda nukukuba īngangabwịte jake. Po papo ndinkwaga ifị̄ndu fịmo ifị fyaliti kyamba kinywamụ iki kịkwaka umōto fịsopị̄gwe mụnyanja. Ikijabo kimo kya nyanja mfijabo fịtatu ifị fịfwene ịtolo kyandwịke kị̄pelịle ịlopa;
66008009	ikibụgụtila kimo kya fyabūmi mfịbụgụtila fịtatu ifị fịfwene ubunywamụ fya mụnyanja kifwịle; kangi ikibụgụtila kimo kya sịtịma mfibụgụtila fịtatu ifị fịgwene kyonāngị̄gwe.
66008010	Ugwandumị gwabutatu jope alinkukuba īngangabwịte jake. Ulutōndwa ulunywamụ ulu lwakaga ngāti ngōka, lulinkusatuka ukufụma kumwanya lulinkugwila pa kijabo kimo kya nyīsi mfijabo fyabo fitatu ifị fyafwene ịtolo ubwịngị na pa nyị̄buko sya mīsi.
66008011	Īngamụ ja lutondwa lulūlu jo Bukāli. Po papo lelo ikijabo kimo kya mīsi mfijabo fitatu ifị fifwene gāli nubukali bwa nkota, abāndu bị̄ngị aba bānwịle amīsi gagaga bafwịle papo galyandwịke gāli nubukali bwa nkota.
66008012	Po lelo jope ugwandumị gwa buna alinkukuba īngangabwịte jake. Ikijabo kimo kya ịsuba mfijabo fyake fitatu ifị fifwene ni kya mwesị ni kya ndōndwa filinkukomịgwa. Ko kuno ikijabo kyabo kimo kimo kyo kilinkwina filinkusyala nulumụlị ifịjabo fịbili fịbili. Ikijabo kimo kya lumụlị lwa pamụ̄sị kyalekịle ukumụlika, pope pakilo syali bo bunobuno.
66008013	Po papo ndinkukēta ndinkwaga ilị̄pūla limo lịkupụlụlụka kumwanya fịjo, ndinkupilika lịkukōlela ilịsyu ilịkulūmba likuti: Ītāta! Ịse! Ītāta! Bịsebēndebule bōsa aba bali pakị̄su bo bikupilika ukulila kwa ngangabwịte, bo bikukuba īngangabwịte syabo abāndumị batatu aba basyele.
66009001	Lelo ugwandumị gwa buhāno alinkukuba īngangabwịte jake. Ndinkulubona ulutōndwa ulu lwasatwịke pakị̄su, po papo lulinkupēgwa ikị̄gulilo kya bwịna bwa ngolōngo.
66009002	Ulutōndwa lwalịgwịle ubwịna bwa ngolōngo, po papo ilyosị lilinkufondomoka ukusōka, lilinkufwana bo ilyosị ili lịkufụma nkigemo kya mapāmba ikinywamụ. Po papo ilị̄suba lilinkwịna gōpe numpālānga gulinkwịna kunōngwa ja lyosị lilalila.
66009003	Amapalālila galinkusụlụka ukufụma nndyosị lilalila ukwịsa pakị̄su, galinkupēgwa amaka ga kuluma bo bakālị̄sya (utupịlịlị).
66009004	Gābūlị̄gwe ukuti gangalyonangaga ilị̄su lya nkị̄su pamo imịpịkị nifị fịkubila fyosa, lolị gabōnangege aba bakakolekeligwa ikimanyịlo kya Kyala pafyenị fyabo.
66009005	Bababa amapalālila gākānịsị̄gwe ukubagoga, lolị kwene ukubakufya nindamyo imyesị mịhāno. Ububabe bwandamyo bwafwene nububabe bwa kulumịgwa na kalị̄sya.
66009006	Mmyesị mịhāno gila gila abāndu bịsakubulōndaga ubufwe lolị batịsakubwagaga; bịsakwịsyukwaga ukufwa, lolị ubufwe bwịsakubabopaga.
66009007	Amapalālila gābonekaga ukufwana falāsi isị sị̄tendekị̄sye ukuja pakulwa ubwịte; pamịtu gyabo fyalịpo fịmo ifị fyafwene ngiga sya sahabu, kangi ifyenị fyabo fyafwene fyenị fya bāndu.
66009008	Īnywịlị sya mapalālila galagala syafwene nywịlị syabakị̄kulu, amị̄no gābo gafwene mị̄no ga ngalamụ.
66009009	Pafịpambaga gāfwele fịmo ifị fyaliti fịsịgafịpambaga fya Kyela. Ifịpiko fyabo fyalilaga ukufwana magelētị ga falāsị īnyị̄ngị isị sịkubopela kukulwa ubwịte.
66009010	Gāli nimị̄swigala bo gigyabakālị̄sa, gyali nutusūfị kūsụlo. Amaka gābo gākubafulakisya abāndu kumyesị mịhāno gāli mmị̄swigala gyabo.
66009011	Gāli numalafyale gwabo, ugwandumị gwa mūngolōngo. Īngamụ jake Nkihịbuli jo Abatonị mmbafwe, nKigiliki jo Apolonija (kokuti Unngogi).
66009012	Ītāta untasị akīndịle, basyele bahītata abāngi babili aba bịkukōngaga.
66009013	Po papo lelo ugwandumị gwa ntandatu alinkukuba īngangabwịte jake. Ndinkupilika ilịsyu lịkufụma mụ̄ngụto syosa syo ịna sya kigemo kya sahabu iki kyimịle nkyenị mwa Kyala.
66009014	Ilịsyu lilīli lilinkujoba ku gwandumị gwa ntandatu uju ali ningangabwịte lilinkuti: Babūle abāndumị bala aba bapịnyị̄gwe pa lwisi ulukulūmba Fụlatị.
66009015	Po lelo abāndumị bāna bala balinkwabuligwa; abēne babīkigwe ngānịla ukuti bịsebābukilege pa kabalilo kala kala aka ịsịku lilalila, ilya mwesị gulagula, ugwa kyinja kilakila, ukuti bịsebagogege ikilūndilo kimo kya bōsa nkisu bo bajabanị̄gwe mfịlūndilo fịtatu ifị fịfwene ịtolo mwịsabu.
66009016	Nābūlị̄gwe ubwịngị bwa basịkali aba bālitogịle pa falāsị: Bāli ba mịlịoni imịa ịbili (200,000,000).
66009017	Mụli isị nākịngulilị̄gwe nāsịbwene īfalāsị nāba bālitogịle pafalasị sịla sịla, bāli nifyakwịsịga pafịpambaga ifịkesēfụ ngāti mōto, fịmo fyali nīlāngi ja bulū, ifị̄ngị fyali nīlāngi ja kajinja. Imịtu gya falasi sịlasịla gafwene bo imịtu gya ngalamụ kangi ukufụma nkanwa kābo gwasokaga gwasokaga umōto nilyosị nikibịlịtị.
66009018	Lelo pa papo ikilūndilo kimo kya bāndubankị̄su mfịlūndilo fịtatu ifị fịfwene ịtolo ubunywamụ kilinkugogịgwa nubutolwe butatu bula: Umōto, ilyosị ni kibịlịtị, ifị fyasōkịle ukufụma nkanwa mụfalāsị.
66009019	Papo amaka ga falāsị gāli nkanwa mmyabo na mmị̄swigala gyabo gyope. Imị̄swigala gyabo gịfwene bo īnjoka, gyope gili nimịtu, gyo gigyo sịkubafụlakisya abāndu.
66009020	Abāndu aba bāsyele bōsa aba bakāgogị̄gwe nubutolwe bububu, bakāpīndwịke kumbōmbo isị bābōmbịle namaboko gābo. Bakālekịle ukwịpụ̄ta kwa gyabaKyala, na kufịfwanị fya sahabu, nifya fesa, ni fya kyela ikibūngu, nifya mabwe, nifya fịpịkị ifị nukukēta fitikukēta, nukupilika fịtịkupilika, nukwenda fịtịkwenda.
66009021	Kangi bakāpīndwịke na kūkubugogị bwabo, nakubulosị bwabo, na kubulogwe bwabo na kubuhījị bwabo. Imịtu gya falāsị gyafwene mịtu gya ngalamụ, ukufụma nkanwa mmyabo gwasokaga umōto, ilyosị nikibịlịtị.
66010001	Po papo kangi ndinkummbona ugwandumị ujūngi ugwamaka ịkusụlụka ukufụma kumwanya anịembetelelị̄gwe mwịbīngu, ali nululānga kuntu; ikyenị kyake kyafwene ịsuba, amalūndi gāke gafwene mbānda sya mōto.
66010002	Ali na kalata unnāndi ummbālule nkiboko kyake. Ikilūndi kyake ikị̄līlo akānyịle mụnyanja, ikị̄mama akānyịle pị̄sīlya,
66010003	alinkukolela ilịsyu ilịkulūmba ukufwana ngalamụ jịkubụna; bo akōlị̄le, injasi ịhāno naịbili, ukwamụla kwabo, sịlinkulụ̄ndụma.
66010004	Lelo bo injasi ịhāno naịbili sịjobịle, bo nguti nsịsị̄mbe isị syajobaga, po ndinkwaga ngupilika ilịsyu lifụmịle kumwanya lịkuti: Īnōngwa isị īnjasị ịhāno naịbili sịjobịle, sya kubutị̄tu, ungasịsị̄mbaga.
66010005	Lelo po papo ugwandumị uju nālimmbwene akanyịle ikilūndi kimo mụnyanja ikīngi pakị̄su pabūmụ alinkwịnula kumwanya ikiboko kyake ikị̄līlo,
66010006	alinkujīgila mụngamụ ja Kyala uju alịko bwịla na bwịla, uju āpelịle kumwanya nikị̄su ninyanja, nifị̄ngị fyosa ifị fịlịmo alinkuti: Akabalilo ka kugụ̄lila kamalị̄ke.
66010007	Lolị linga ugwandumị gwa buhāno nabubili akubịle īngangabwịte jake, po Kyala ịsakusimalisyaga isị abātị̄ke kubutị̄tu, ukukōnga bo mụno ābafụmụkị̄sye ababōmbị bāke, abakụ̄ngụlụka.
66010008	Po lelo ilịsyu ili nālipilị̄ke bo lịkujoba ukufụma kumwanya lilinkujoba nanịne kangi, lilinkuti: Būka ukēge kalata ummbālule uju ali nkiboko kya gwandumị uju īmịle panyanja na pakị̄su.
66010009	Ndinkubūka kugwandumị ndinkunsūma ukuti ambepo kalata unnāndi jula jula. Ālimbūlịle ātịle: Ega, unndyege; ịkubabaga mụ̄nda, lolị nkanwa mo ịkujaga nnyāfụ ukuti lukị.
66010010	Po papo ndinkwega kalata unnāndi jula ukufụma nkiboko kya gwandumị, ndinkulya gwesa, nkanwa alinkunoga bo ulūkị ubunyāfụ. Lolị bo ndịle po mụlinkūmbaba mụ̄nda.
66010011	Lelo po papo ndinkubūlịgwa ukuti: Ubagị̄le ukufụmụsya kangi īndumị ja Kyala iji jịkujoba isya bāndu bị̄ngị, nifịkolo, ninjobelo, nabanyafyale.
66011001	Po papo ndinkupēgwa ulupịkị lwa kupimila ulu lwafwene ngịlị, ndinkwenda nukubūlịgwa ukuti: Sụmụka, upime īnyụ̄mba ja Kyala īnyị̄kemo ni kigemo kya kwịkemēkesyapo, ubabale nāba bịkwịpụ̄tamo.
66011002	Lolị ungasịpimaga īmbaso sya pānja, papo sịsịsyo syo bāpēgị̄gwe abapānja, aba bịsakukakanyangaga akāja akị̄kemo imyesị amalōngo mana na mabili.
66011003	Nịsakubatumaga abakētị bāngu babili aba bo bafwele ifịgụnila, bo bịsakufụmụsyaga īndumị ja Kyala amasịku elịfụ jumo, āmịa babili na malōngo ntandatu (1260).
66011004	Abakētị babili gyo mịsyunguti mịbili; fyo fịkolelanyāle fịbili, ifị fikwima nkyenị mụ NTWA gwa kị̄su.
66011005	Linga jumo ịkuti mbōnange, umōto gukusōka ukufụma nkanwa mmyabo gukubagoga abalugu bābo; buno buno lelo gwesa uju linga ịkubōnānga jo gwakugogịgwa.
66011006	Abāndu bababa bali namaka ga kwịgalako kumwanya ukuti jingatịmaga īfụla nkabalilo aka linga bali pakufụmụsya īndumị ja Kyala. Bāli namaka gākugāndula amīsi Ukwịpela ịlopa, bāli namaka nukukitwalila ikị̄su ubutolwe ubusịsya bōsa ịtolo, nkabalilo kōsa ịtolo aka linga bịganịle.
66011007	Lelo bo bamalịle ukufụmụsya īndumị jabo, ikinyamāna iki kịkusōka ukufụma mmbwịna bwa ngolōngo, kịsakulwaga nabo, kịsakubatolaga nukubagoga.
66011008	Po lelo imịfị̄mba gyabo gịsakujaga mụmpūlo gwa kāja akakulūmba, mụno UNTWA gwabo ākomelịgwe pakikohekano. Īngamụ ja mbupīngamụ ja kāja kalakala jo Sotomụ pamo Egịpịtị.
66011009	Abāndu ukufụma mfị̄su fyosa, namfịkolo fyosa, na mụnjobelo syosa, abāndu ba luko lōsa bisakugikētaga imịfị̄mba gyabo amasịku matatu nimịfị̄mba, bịsakukanịsyaga ukugisyila.
66011010	Abāndu ba pakị̄su bịsakusekelaga kunōngwa ja bufwe bwa bakụngụlụka babili bababa. Bịsakubīkaga ulusekelo nukupāna ifyabupe namanga abakụ̄ngụlụka bala bala bābakufyaga fịjo abāndu ba pakị̄su.
66011011	Bo gakīndịle amasịku matatu na hāfụ umūjị gwa būmị gulinkwịsa ukufụma kwa Kyala gulinkwịngila mmyabo po papo balinkwenda nukusụmụka balinkwima; ulutēnde lulinkubakola bōsa aba bābabonaga.
66011012	Po papo lelo abakụngụlụka babili bala balinkupilika ilịsyu ilịkulūmba lịkujoba nabo ukufụma kumwanya lịkuti: Amụfyuke mwịse kuno! Bo bịkukēta na balugu bābo balinkufyuka ukubūka kumwanya ukwendela mwịbīngu.
66011013	Pakabalilo kalakala kālipo akasenyenda akakulūmba; ikijabo kimo kya kāja mfịjabo fyake kalōngo ifị fyafwene ịtolo kyabụlụtwịke, abāndu baelufụ bahāno nababili (7,000) bāfwịle. Abāndu aba bāsyele ulutēnde lwabakomịle balinkubutụ̄fya ubukulūmba bwa Kyala gwa kumwanya.
66011014	Ītāta gwa bubili akīndịle; lolị, ukēte! Ītāta ugwa butatu ịkuja pakwịsa atịkukābilaga.
66011015	Po papo ugwandumị gwa buhāno nabubili alinkukuba īngangabwịte jake, po utōgo utukulūmba tulinkupilikịgwa kumwanya bo tụkuti: Lilino amaka gākulagila ikị̄su kyosa ga ju NTWA gwitu na Mesịja gwake, ịkujaga nndagilị gwa bwịla bwịla.
66011016	Lelo abakulūmba amalōngo mabili na bāna aba bịkwịtūgasya pafịkota fya butwa nkyenị mwa Kyala balinkwịtaga pāsi balinkunngụndamịla balinkwịpụ̄ta kwa Kyala,
66011017	balinkuti: Gwe NTWA Kyala Gwamaka gōsa, gwe ulịko lilino, gwe gwalịko na ịjolo, Tukugwa ulupị kumyako, apa gwegịle amaka gāko amakulūmba gwịpelịle ukuja nndagilị.
66011018	Abapanja bakalēle, lolị īngalalisị syako syalịsịle, akabalilo kakubalōngela abafwe kālisịle, Akabalilo kakubabombela ababōmbị bako abakụ̄ngụlụka, nabị̄kemo nāba bịkujitị̄la īngamụ jako, abakulūmba nabanāndi. Akabalilo kafịkịle, akakubapyụtila aba bịkukipyụta ikị̄su.
66011019	Po papo īnyụ̄mba īnyị̄kemo ja Kyala kumwanya jilinkwigulịgwa, ilịbokosị lya lufị̄ngo lwake lilinkuboneka nkāti mụnyụ̄mba jake īnyị̄kemo. Kangi filinkujako ifịmwekụ fya njasị, utōgo, ukulụ̄ndụma kwa njasị, akasenyenda nifụla ja mabwe īnyị̄ngị.
66012001	Po papo lelo kilinkuboneka ikị̄ka ikikulūmba kumwanya, āliko unkịkulu jumo uju āfwalaga ilị̄suba, umwesị gwali kūsi kunjajo syake, kuntu āfwele īngiga ja butwa iji jali nindōndwa kalōngo naịbili.
66012002	Unkị̄kulu jujuju ali nikifụba alinkukụ̄ta bo ịkubabịgwa nu nukwịgōnja bo ịkuja pakupapa umwana.
66012003	Ikị̄ka ikīngi kilinkuboneka kumwanya, jali nyị̄fwila īnywamụ fịjo īfụbīfụ, jali nimịtu mịhāno namịbili nimbēmbe kalōngo, kukuti ntu gwali ningiga jabutwa.
66012004	Īndōndwa syakibugutila kimo mfibugutila fịtatu nyị̄fwila alinkusịlụ̄sa nunswịgala gwake ukufụma kumwanya alinkwakusịtāga pakị̄su. Alinkwakwima nkyenị mụ nkị̄kulu ukuja pakulya umwana bo afụmịle pakupāpịgwa ịtolo.
66012005	Po papo unkị̄kulu alinkumpapa umwana unndumyana, uju āli gwakufịlagila ifị̄su fyosa ningịlị ja kyela. Lolị umwana julajula ēnda nukunyakịgwa alinkutwalịgwa kwa Kyala, kukikota kyake ikyabutwa.
66012006	Unkị̄kulu ābopị̄le mmatēngele, mụno Kyala alintendekekịsye ngānị ubujo bwa kunswililapo amasịku elịfụ jumo na bāmịa babili na malōngo ntandatu (1,260).
66012007	Lelo po papo ubwịte bulinkukolana kumwanya. Mịkaelị nabāndumị bāke balinkulwa na Nyị̄fwila, jope nabāndumị bāke,
66012008	lolị Nyị̄fwila atolị̄gwe, po lelo jūjo nabāndumị bāke balinkwenda nukukanịsịgwa ukuja nubujo kangi kumwanya.
66012009	Nyị̄fwila unnywamụ alinkutāgigwa Njoka ngulu jula uju bịkuti umōhesị pamo setano, uju ākisyobịle ikị̄su kyosa, ātāgị̄gwe pakị̄su pamopēne na bāndumị bāke bōsa.
66012010	Po kangi ndinkupilika ilịsyu ilịkulūmba kumwanya lịkuti: Lilino bwịsịle ubupokị bwa Kyala! Lilino Kyala anāngị̄sye amaka gāke ukuja jo Malafyale! Lilino Mesịja gwake anāngị̄sye amaka gāke gabulagilị! Namanga uju īmaga nkyenị mwa Kyala nukubasịtaka abakamụ bītu pamụ̄sị napakilo atụnyụkisị̄gwe pāsi ukufụma kumwanya.
66012011	Abakamụ bītu bālintolịle mmbwịte kunōngwa ja ịlopa lya Kang'ōsị na kubwanalolị ubu bābufụmụsyaga; namanga bakābupakịsye nubūmị bwabo, bakābubonaga ukuti kāndu kamo, bakāpāsyaga nukufwa.
66012012	Po papo lelo amụsekelege mwe fị̄su fyakumwanya nanụmwe mwesa mwe mụjēngilemo; uhīlị gwe kị̄su kya pāsi na gwe nyanja! Namanga umōhesị asụlwịke kumyinụ, kangi nkalale fịjo, papo amēnye ukuti ali nakabalilo kanāndi ịtolo aka kasyele.
66012013	Bo nyị̄fwila asyagēnịe ukuti atụnyụkisịgwe pakị̄su, alinkwanda ukumfwima unkị̄kulu jula āpāpịle umwana unndumyana.
66012014	Umwene unkị̄kulu jula āpēgị̄gwe amapiko mabili aga ịpūla ilị̄nywamụ gakupụlụkila kubujo bwake mmatēngele, kuno āli gwakuswilịgwa ifyinja fịtatu nihāfu, alinkupona ukwịsilịgwa na nyị̄fwila.
66012015	Po lelo nyị̄fwila alinkusōsya amīsi ukufụma nkanwa mmyake aga gāfwene lwisi ubwịngị, galinkunkōnga mụnyụma unkị̄kulu jula ukuti gankukule apise nago.
66012016	Lolị ikị̄su kyalintūlịle unkị̄kulu jula; kyalyasēme unndōmo gwake kyenda nukugamịla amīsi gala gafụmịle nkanwa mwa nyị̄fwila.
66012017	Lelo po papo nyị̄fwila alinkwenda nukunkalalila fịjo unkị̄kulu, alinkusụmụka ukubūka kukulwa na banndujụ̄ngu lwa nkị̄kulu aba bāsyele, bōsa aba bịkusịkōnga īngomēlesyo sya Kyala nukubumīlila ubwanalolị bwa Jesụ.
66013001	Po papo ndinkukibona ikinyamāna kịkufyuluka ukufụma mụnyanja. Kyali nimbēmbe kalōngo nimịtu mịhāno namịbili; palupēmbe lumōlumo jalịpo īngiga jabutwa, kangi pantu gumogumo jalịpo īngamụ iji janhēlụlaga Kyala.
66013002	Ikinyamāna kikīki kyabonekaga ukufwana ịbōle, amalūndi gāke gafwene bo agā mwimbe, unndomo gwalīti gwa ngalamụ. Nyị̄fwila alinkukipa ikinyamāna amaka gāke, ikikota kyabutwa nubulagilị bwake ubukulūmba.
66013003	Untu gumo gwa Kinyamāna gwabonekaga ukuti gufụlēle gukīndilị̄le, lolị ikilōnda kyaponịle. Ikị̄su kyosa kilinkuswịga kangi kilinkunkōnga nyị̄fwila.
66013004	Po papo abāndu bōsa balinkwịpụ̄ta kwa nyị̄fwila papo nyị̄fwila amaka gāke ālimpēle kinyamāna. Balinkwịpụ̄ta na kwa kinyamāna kōpe balinkuti: Jwanị uju afwene na Kinyamāna? Uju abagị̄le ukulwa nagwe?
66013005	Kinyamāna ālitikisị̄gwe ukujoba amasyu ga nyịtụ̄fyo aga gāli gākunhēlula Kyala, kangi āpēgị̄gwe amaka ga bulagilị kumyesị amalōngo mana na mịbili.
66013006	Alinkwanda ukuntuka Kyala, ningamụ jake, ubujo ubu ājēngịleko, na bōsa ịtolo aba bajēngịle kumwanya.
66013007	Ālịtikisị̄gwe ukulwa nabāndu ba Kyala nukubatola, kangi āpēgị̄gwe ubulagilị kufịkolo fyosa, kubandu bōsa, kunjobelo syosa, na kufị̄su fyosa.
66013008	Abāndu bōsa pakị̄su bịsakwịpụ̄taga kumyake, lolị bomma aba īngamụ syabo syasị̄mbị̄gwe mwakalata gwabūmị, bo nikị̄su kikāli ukupelịgwa, mwa kalata gwa Kang'ōsi uju āgogīgwe.
66013009	Uju linga ali nimbulukutu jo alīpilikaga sịsịsị!
66013010	Uju linga ịkubatwala kukupịnyịgwa abāndu ba Kyala jo ịsakupinyịgwaga jūjo, uju linga ịkubagoga abāngi nulūbo, jo isakugogeligwaga nulūbo jope. Sịsịsị syo syakubasoka abāndu ba Kyala ukuti bajege bafị̄ndang'oma kangi bajege nulwịtiko.
66013011	Kangi ndinkwaga ngummbona kinyamāna ujūngi ịkutupuka ukufụma mụmfụ, Āli nimbēmbe ịbili isị syafwene bo īmbēmbe isya kang'ōsị akanāndi, kangi ājobaga ngāti nyị̄fwila.
66013012	Ābombelaga ubulagilị ubukulūmba bwa kinyamāna untasị nkyenị mmyake. Alinkukifịmbilisya ikị̄su kya pāsi nāba bājēngịle mụmo ukuti bịpụ̄tege kwa kinyamāna untasị jula, uju ikifụlalo kyake kyalyumịle.
66013013	Kinyamāna gwa bubili jujuju ābōmbaga ifị̄swigu ifịkulūmba; umōto āgupelị̄le ukulagala ukufụma kumwanya nkyenị mmbāndu bōsa.
66013014	Abāndu bōsa aba bajēngịle pakị̄su alinkubasyobela mfị̄ka ifị ālitikisị̄gwe ukufịbōmba nkyenị mwa kinyamāna untasị. Kinyamāna alinkubabūla abāndu ukuti batendekesye ikifwanị kya kummwimikila Kinyamāna jula āfụlasị̄gwe nulūbo lolị lelo āponịle.
66013015	Kinyamāna gwabubili alinkupēgwa ukukipūtila umūjị gwabūmị ikifwanị kya kinyamāna untasị ukuti kimanye ukujoba nukubagoga aba bakị̄pụ̄taga kuli kikyo.
66013016	Kinyamāna jula alinkubakola kumaka abāndu bōsa abanāndi nabakulūmba, abakabị nabalōndo, abatumwa nābābūke ukuja nikimanyịlo pafịboko fyabo ifị̄līlo pamo pafyenị fyabo.
66013017	Najumo akābagị̄le ukubōmba ubukyụlụsị uju akāsịsiligwepo ikimanyịlo kya ngamụ ja kinyamāna pamo īnāmbala iji jịkusịmbịgwa mmbujo bwa ngamụ jake.
66013018	Isị sịkulōnda ukusịnogonela mmahala fị̄jo pakusyaganịa. Uju linga ali namahala jo abagị̄le ukujilīngānịa mbwelụ īsanụkisyo ja nāmbala ja kinyamāna jujujo, nāmbala ja sanụkisyo ja ngamụ ja mụ̄ndu jumo. Īnāmbala jijiji jili bāmịa ntandatu namalongo ntandatu na ntandatu pamwanya (666).
66014001	Po papo ndinkukēta ndinkwaga Kang'ōsị īmịle pakyamba Sioni; bali pamopēne nagwe abāndu baelufụ mia jumo namalongo mana nabāna (144,000) aba bali ningamụ jake ningamụ ja gwịse, isị syasị̄mbị̄gwe pafyenị fyabo.
66014002	Kangi ndịkupilika ilịsyu lịkufụma kumwanya lịkōbela ukufwana nndūlilo, salala kulinkufwana kutajanịka kukulūmba kwa njasị. Ukulila kulinkufwana fịsāngo fịkukubịgwa.
66014003	Abāndu 144,000 bala bālyimịle nkyenị nkikota kyabutwa na nifyabūmị fịna fịla na nkyenị mbakulūmba bala, balinkwimba ulwimbo ulupya ulu bāmēnye bēne bābo ukulumanyịla. Mmbāndu bankị̄su bōsa bo bēne po papo aba bābāngị̄gwe.
66014004	Bāli bo bāndu aba bakịnyasyamo mmbakị̄kulu, abēlụ ịtolo aba bịkunkōnga Kang'ōsị kōsa kuno ịkubūka. Bo aba bābāngị̄gwe bēne mmbāndu bōsa bankị̄su, fyo fịlubukilwa fya Kyala na Kang'ōsị.
66014005	Bo aba bakatungulupamo sịku; batịkusobamo nasịmo.
66014006	Po kangi ndinkummbona ugwandumị ujūngi ịkupụlụlụka kumwanya fịjo mụmpālānga, akolị̄le ilịbāngilị lya bwịla lya Nōngwa īnụnụ isya kufịfụmụkisya ifịkolo fyosa ifị fịjēngịle pakị̄su, uluko lōsa lwa bāndu pakị̄su, ifịkolo fyosa nifị̄su fyosa.
66014007	Alinkujoba alinkwịnēnga alinkuti: Amụmmwimịkege Kyala, amụbutụ̄fyege ubukulūmba bwake! Namanga akabalilo kakubalōngela abāndu bōsa pakị̄su umwene, kafịkịle. Amwịpụ̄tege kumyake uju apelịle kumwanya na pāsi, ninyanja ninyị̄buko sya mīsi!
66014008	Ugwandumị ugwabubili alinkukōnga kuntasị alinkujoba alinkuti: Agwịle! Babelị unkulūmba agwịle! Ifịkolo āfịpelelaga ukunwa ubwalwa bwake bwa māfị̄lu ubwalwa bwa māfị̄lu ubukali, bwa bulogwe bwake! Ubukindilisi.
66014009	Ugwandumị gwa butatu alinkukōnga kubatasị babili bala, alinkujoba niịsyu ilịkulūmba alinkuti: Gwesa uju ịkwịpụ̄ta kwa kinyamāna na kukifwanị kyake kangi āmbilị̄le ikimanyịlo pakyenị kyake pamo pakiboko kyake,
66014010	jo ịsakunwaga ubwalwa bwa māfị̄lu bwa Kyala, ubwalwa bwa māfị̄lu bwa ngalalisị syake, ubu akūsị̄sye namaka gāke gōsa nkikōmbe kya bukalale bwake! Bōsa aba bịkubōmba sịsịsị bịsakukubilwaga mmōto na kibịlịtị nkyenị mmbāndumị abị̄kemo na mwa Kang'ōsị.
66014011	Ilyosị lya mōto ugu gukubakufya lịsakufụ̄kaga bwịla na bwịla. Butịsakujako ubutūsyo pamụ̄sị na pakiko kuli aba bịkwịpụ̄ta kwa Kinyamāna na kukifwanị kyake na kuli gwesa uju ali nikimanyịlo kya ngamụ jake.
66014012	Sịsịsị lelo syo fịkuti sịbapelelege ubufịndang'oma abị̄kemo ba Kyala aba bịkusịkōnga īndagilo sya Kyala nukunsūbila Jesụ.
66014013	Po lelo kangi ndinkupilika ilịsyu lifụmịle kumwanya lịkuti: Sịmbaga utigi: Basangalufụ aba bịkufwilaga mụ NTWA ukufụma lilino! Jope Mbepo ịkwịtikila ịkuti: Ena nalolị! Bịsakusekelaga bo batūsị̄sye īmbōmbo jabo īngafụ, namanga īseke sya mbōmbo syabo īnụnụ sịsakubakōngaga kumwanya.
66014014	Lelo ndinkukēta ndinkwaga ịbīngu lyelụ, ifị fyatūgēlepo pị̄bīngu fịlinkuboneka ukufwana mụ̄ndu afwele īngiga ja butwa ja sahabu, kangi akolị̄le īsēngo īnyūgị nkiboko kyake.
66014015	Po lelo ugwandumị ujūngi alinkusōka ukufụma nnyụ̄mba īnyị̄kemo alinkukụ̄ta ilịsyu ilịkulūmba kuli uju ātūgēle pị̄bīngu alinkuti: Ega īsēngo jako, utondolege, namanga akabalilo kantondolo kị̄sịle; ifyakutondola ifị fịli pakị̄su fịbifịfwe.
66014016	Lelo popapo uju ātūgēle pamwanya pị̄bīngu ulinkujisopa pakị̄su īsēngo jake, ifị fyali fyakutondola pakị̄su fịlinkwenda nukutondolịgwa.
66014017	Po lelo ndinkummbona ugwandumị ujūngi ịkusōka ukufụma nnyụ̄mba īnyị̄kemo ja kumwanya; jope akolị̄le īsēngo īnyūgị.
66014018	Kangi ugwandumị ujūngi, uju agulagilaga umōto alinkusōka ukufụma nkigemo kyakwịkemēkesyapo jo alinkukōlela ilịsyu ilịkulūmba kuli uju ali nisengo inyugị, alinkuti: Kolaga isēngo jake inyugị ufịbunganịege ifịsāsa fya mpịkị gwa māfị̄lu ugwa pāsi pakị̄su, buno īseke sịbifị̄fwe.
66014019	Po papo ugwandumị jula alinkusopa isēngo jake pāsi pakị̄su, alinkusịbunganịa īseke sya mpịkị gwa māfị̄lu ugwa pāsi pakị̄su, nukusisopa nkya kukamịlamo amạfị̄lu ikikulumba ikya ngalalisị sya Kyala.
66014020	Ikyene ikya kukamịlamo amạfị̄lu kila, kilinkukanyangịgwa pānja pabupị̄pị nakāja kala, po papo ilịlopa lilinkusōka nkya kukamịlamo amạfị̄lu, lilinkufyuka ukwakufịka mfyēla fya mụngego sya fwalasị, ukufwana ninjila ja mailị āmịa babili (200).
66015001	Po papo ndinkukibona ikị̄ka ikīngi kumwanya ikikulumba, ikya kuswịgisya; abāndumị bahāno na babili bo bākolị̄le ubutolwe buhāno na bubili ubwa bumalīkisyo, namanga muli sịsịsị mo sịmalikị̄le ingalalisị sya Kyala.
66015002	Ndinkukibona ikindu kimo iki kyaliti nyanja ja magalasị aga gongene numōto, naba bantolịle kinyamāna nikifwanị kyake nimbalilo ja ngamụ jake, bo balyimịle pāmbali,
66015003	panyanja ja magalasị, bākolị̄le ifịsango fya Kyala. Abene bīmbaga ulwimbo lwa Mose untumwa gwa Kyala, nulwimbo lwa Kang'osi, balinkuti: Imbōmbo syako gwe NTWA Kyala, gwe Mwenemaka gōsa, ngulūmba, kangi sya kuswịgisya. Syope ninjila syako, gwe NTWA gwa fikolo fyosa syo ngolofụ kangi sya nalolị.
66015004	Gwe NTWA, jwanị uju atịsakukutị̄la nukujīmika īngamụ jako? Buno uli mwịkemo jujugwe gwịmwene. Ifịkolo fyosa fịsakwịsaga nukubụngụlụka nkyenị mmyako, namanga imbōmbo syako īngolofụ sịkịngulị̄gwe.
66015005	Panyuma pali sịsịsị ndinkukēta, ndinkwaga Tempelị gwa hēma ja lusịsịmikisyo ịgulị̄gwe kumwanya,
66015006	kangi abāndumị bahāno na babili bala, aba bakolị̄le ubutolwe buhāno na bubili bula bịkusōka mwa Tempelị, bafwele imyenda imyelụ igi gikung'alịka, kangi balịfundikilị̄le imịpango gya sahabu pafịpambaga fyabo.
66015007	Po papo kimo mfyumị fịna fịla, kilinkubapa abāndumị bala bahāno na babili inyāngabya sya sahabu ịhāno na ịbili, isị sị̄swile ingalalisị sya Kyala, uju mūmị bwịla na bwịla.
66015008	Po papo Tempelị alinkwịsula ilyosị ili lịkufụma mbukulūmba bwa Kyala na mmaka gāke; najumo akabagile ukwịngilamo mwa Tempelị, ukufịka papo bumalikilege ubutolwe buhāno na bubili bula bwa bandumị bo bahāno na babili bala.
66016001	Po papo ndinkupilika ilịsyu ilịkulūmba ukufụma mwa Tempelị lịkubabula abāndumị bahāno na babili bala lịkuti: Amụbūkege mụkēne pakị̄su ingalalisị sya Kyala, isị sịli mụnyāngabya ịhāno na ịbili.
66016002	Po papo alinkubūka ugwa kwanda, alinkōnela ifya ndwangabya lwake pakị̄su; po papo ifịlōnda ifịbị̄bị ifịbofu fịlinkubakola abāndu aba bali nikimanyịlo kya kinyamāna, naba babụngụlụkaga kukifwanị kyake.
66016003	Ugwa bubili alinkōnela ifya ndwangabya lwake panyanja; ijēne jilinkwịpela ukuja ịlopa bo liịsịku lya mụ̄ndu umfwe, po papo fyosa ifyumị ifị fịlịmo mụnyanja fịlinkufwa.
66016004	Ugwa butatu alinkōnela ifya ndwangabya lwake mụnyisi na mụnyị̄buko sya misi; syo sịlinkwịpela ukuja ịlopa.
66016005	Po papo ndinkupilika ugwandumị gwa misi ikuti: Uli ngolofụ gwe ulịko, kangi gwe gwalịko, gwe Mwikemo, papo ulongịle bo bunobuno;
66016006	namanga balyonịle ịlopa lya bikemo nabakụ̄ngụlụka, kangi ubapele ukuti banwege ilịlopa; syo sịbabagị̄le ịtolo.
66016007	Po ndinkupilika ikigemo kya kwịkemēkesyapo kịkuti: Ena gwe NTWA Kyala, gwe Mwenemaka gōsa, ubulōngị bwako bo bwa nalolị kangi bugolofụ ịtolo.
66016008	Ugwa buna alinkōnela ifya ndwangabya lwake pịsuba,
66016009	ilyene lilinkwitikisịgwa ukubokya abāndu numoto. Po papo abāndu balinkupya fị̄jo; abene balinkujituka īngamụ ja Kyala, uju ali namaka ga kubulagila ubutolwe bōsa bububu, balinkusịta nukupinduka ukuti bampege ubukulūmba.
66016010	Ugwa buhāno alinkōnela ifya ndwangabya lwake pakikota kya butwa bwa kinyamāna jula; po papo ubutwa bwake bōsa bulinkwịpela ngị̄sị, abāndu balinkwilumanịa panōngwa ja kukubilwa;
66016011	balinkunhēlula Kyala gwa kumwanya panōngwa ja kukubilwa kwabo, na panōngwa ja fịlonda fyabo; pope balinkusịta nukupinduka kumbombo syabo.
66016012	Ugwa ntandatu alinkōnela ifya ndwangabya lwake ndwisi ulukulūmba ulwa Fụlatị; po papo amīsi gāke galinkūma, ukuti jitendekesịgwege injila ja batwa abafụma kubusōkelo ilị̄suba.
66016013	Po papo ndinkwaga sịkusōka nkanwa mwa nyị̄fwila, na mwa kinyamāna, na mụnkụ̄ngụlụka gwa butụngulu mbepo inyāli ịtatu isị syafwanaga fyula;
66016014	namanga isyene syo mbepo sya bāsētano, isị sịkupela ifị̄ka, sịkusōka ukubuka kubatwa aba nkisu kyosa, kukubabūngānịa ukubuka kubwịte ubwa pịsịku ilịkulūmba ilya Kyala,
66016015	Umwenemaka gōsa. Keta nịkwịsa bo ju nhījị, nsangalufu uju ali māso, uju ịkufwala kanụnụ imyenda gyake ukuti angajaga ịtolo, ko kuti bangasịbonaga īmbelasoni syake.
66016016	Po papo sịlinkubabungānikisya pabujo ubu nki Hịbuli bịkuti Halamagedoni.
66016017	Ugwandumị ugwa buhāno na bubili alinkōnela ifya ndwangabya lwake mụmpālānga; ilịsyu ilịkulūmba lilinkufụma mwa Tempelị nkikota kya butwa lilinkuti: Sịmalịke.
66016018	Po papo filinkujako ifịmwekụ fya njasị, nutōgo, nukulụndụma kwa njasị, kalinkujapo nakasenyenda akakulūmba aka kakabonịkemo sịku, ukufụma mụmo abāndu bandilege ukujapo pakị̄su; akēne akasenyenda kakakā kāli kakulumba nalolị.
66016019	Po papo akaja akakulūmba kalinkutapukana, kalinkwịpela ukuja fịjabo fịtatu; utwene utwaja twa bapānja tulinkugwa, jope na ju Babelị unkulūmba, Kyala alinkusịta nukummwịbwa ukumpa ikinwelo kya bwalwa bwa ngalalisị sya ngịmbuko syake.
66016020	Isūngo syosa isị sịli mụnjanja sịlinkubopa, kangi kikālipo nakimo ikyamba ikya kuboneka;
66016021	gōpe namabwe ga fula amakulūmba aga gali bo ju talenti ubusịto galinkubagwīla abāndu ukufụma kumwanya; abene abāndu balinkuntuka Kyala panōngwa ja butolwe bwa fula ja mabwe, namanga ubutolwe bula bwali bụkulumba nalolị.
66017001	Po papo jumo mbāndumị bahāno na babili bala, aba bakolịle inyāngabya ịhāno na ịbili sịla, alinkwịsa, alinkujoba nanịne, alinkuti: Ịsaga, nịsakukunangisyaga ukulōngịgwa kwa nhahanị jula unkulūmba, uju ịtūgēsye pamisi amị̄ngị,
66017002	uju abatwa ba nkisu balogịlwe nagwe, kangi uju aba nkisu bagālile ubwalwa bwa buhahanị bwake.
66017003	Po papo alinkumbimbila mwa Mbepo, alinkundwala ndungalāngala; ndinkummbona unkị̄kulu ịtogịle pa kinyamāna umfụbīfụ, uju mụmbili gwake syali ngamụ ndupu sya mahēlu, jo āli nimịtu mịhano na mịbili nimbēmbe kalōngo.
66017004	Umwene unkị̄kulu afwikịgwe imyenda imịfụbīfụ ubutị̄tu, nimịkesēfụ; anosị̄gwe na sahabu nutubwe utupala ninyāmbo, ākolile ikinwelo kya sahabu mmaboko gāke, iki kyalị̄swile ifịnyanyasị nubunyalị bwa buhahanị bwake;
66017005	kangi pakyenị kyake po jasịmbịgwepo īngamụ ja mbutị̄tu, iji jịkuti: BABELỊ UNKULUMBA, UNNA GWA BAHAHANỊ, KANGI UNNA GWA FINYANYASỊ FYA NKỊSU.
66017006	Po papo ndinkummbona unkị̄kulu jula, agālile ilịlopa lya bikemo nilya aba bansịsịmịkisyaga Jesụ.
66017007	Lelo bo numbwene, po ndinkuswịga fịjo. Po papo ugwandumị alinkundālūsya alinkuti: Kuswịganịka fịkị? Une nịkukubulaga isya kubutị̄tu isya nkị̄kulu, nisya kinyamāna uju ampīmbile, uju ali nimịtu mịhano na mịbili, nimbēmbe kalōngo.
66017008	Kinyamāna uju umbwene, jo alịko, lolị lilino akajako, kangi ịkuja pakufyuka ukufụma mbwịna bwa ngolōngo, nukubụka kulonāngiko. Abene aba bajēngịle pakị̄su, aba īngamụ syabo sikasịmbị̄gwe mwa kalata gwa bumị ukufụma mụ mbwandilo bwa kịsu, bịsakuswịgaga bo bịkumbona kinyamāna, ukuti alịko lolị akajako, kangi ịsakujangako.
66017009	Popapo po asyaganịege uju linga ali namahala. Imịtu mịhano na mibili gila fyo fyamba fịhano na fịbili, ifị unkị̄kulu jula atugesyepo;
66017010	kangi bo batwa bahāno na babili, bahāno bo bagwile, jumo alịko, ujūngi jo akāli ukwịsa; lelo linga ịsịle,
66017011	po fịkuti ị̄se ajēngeko akabalilo akanāndi ịtolo. Umwene kinyamāna uju āliko, lolị lilino akajako, jo gwa lwele, kangi jo jumo muli bala bahāno na babili; jo asṃwịke kulonāngiko.
66017012	Isyene īmbēmbe kalōngo isị gwasịbwene, bo batwa kalōngo, aba bakāli ukwambilila ubutwa; lolị bịkwambililaga ubulagilị ukuja batwa ku sala jimojēne ịtolo, pamopēne na kinyamāna.
66017013	Abene bababa bo bali ninyịnogono sịmosyene,
66017014	kangi bịkumpa kinyamāna amaka nubulagilị bwabo. Bababa bo bịsakulwaga ubwịte na Kang'osi, jo isakubatolaga, papo jo Malafyale gwa banyafyale, kangi jo NTWA gwa batwa; abene aba bali nagwe bo babilikilịgwa, basalịgwa, kangi basūbilịgwa.
66017015	Po papo alinkumbula alinkuti: Amīsi aga gwagabwene apa atugesye unhahanị jula, bo bāndu, fyo fịlundilo, fyo fịkolo,
66017016	kangi syo njobelo. Syope nimbēmbe kalōngo sịla gwasịbwene, pamopēne na kinyamāna, fyo fịsakumbengaga unhahanị jula, fisakundekaga mwene ịtolo, fịsakumfulaga imyenda, fịsakundyaga īnyama jake, kangi fisakunkosyaga numoto;
66017017	namanga Kyala asịbīkịle mụndụmbụla syabo, ukuti babōmbēge sịsyo ị̄nogwịne jūjo, bo bali nyịnogono sịmosyene, ko kuti bampege kinyamāna ubutwa bwabo, ukufịka papo gịsakwịsilaga amasyu ga Kyala.
66017018	Umwene unkị̄kulu uju gwalimbwene, ko kāja akakulūmba, aka kali nubulagilị pabatwa bā nkisu.
66018001	Panyuma pali sịsịsị, ndinkummbona ugwandumị ujūngi ịkusuluka ukufụma kumwanya, jo āli nāmaka amakulūmba;
66018002	alinkukimulịka ikị̄su nubukulūmba bwake. Po papo alinkukolela ilịsyu lya maka alinkuti: Agwịle, agwịle Babelị unkulūmba, ịpelịle ukuja butugalo bwa bāsētano; kangi ịpelịle ukuja bujo bwa mbepo inyāli, ịpelịle ukuja bujo bwa njunị syosa inyāli isị sịbengị̄gwe;
66018003	namanga ifịkolo fyosa fịnwịle ubwalwa bwa ngalalisị sya buhahanị bwake, kangi abatwa ba nkisu balogịlwe nagwe, bope bakakyụlụsị aba nkisu bị̄pelịle bakabị panōngwa ja bulyafyosa bwake.
66018004	Po papo ndinkupilika ilịsyu ilīngi lịkufuma kumwanya lịkuti: Amụsōkemo mmyake mwe bāndu bāngu, ukuti mụngalīlanịlaga nagwe īmbị̄bị syake, nukuti bungabāgaga ubutolwe ubu bụkummwịsila;
66018005	namanga īmbị̄bị syake sịlūndị̄le sịjịlekufịka na kumwanya; umwene Kyala asịkūmbwịke īmbị̄bị syake.
66018006	Amụnngomokesyege bo papo jope ābagomokesyaga, kangi mụnngomokesyege kabili pambōmbo syake; ikinwelo iki abakologị̄lemo, kyo mụnkologelēngemo kabili.
66018007	Bo mụmo ị̄tūkifyaga, kangi āli ndyafyosa, mo mụmo mụmpelege īngubilo nubusụlụmanịe. Namanga ịkujoba mụndụmbụla jake ịkuti: Ndugēsye papapa ne ntwa ne nkị̄kulu, ngaja mfwile, kangi ubusụlụmanịe ndisakububonamo sịku.
66018008	Panōngwa jijiji, ulufụ̄ndo lōsa lwịsakummwịsilaga kwịsịku limolyene, jo mbūngo īmbelabufwe, nubusụlụmanịe, ninjala; kangi isakukosigwaga numoto; namanga UNTWA Kyala uju ịkundōnga, jo gwa maka.
66018009	Abene abatwa ba nkisu aba balogwaga nagwe, nukulinda nagwe mbulyafyosa bwake, bo bịsakundililaga nukukụ̄ta, bo bịkulibona ilyosị lyake bo ịkupya;
66018010	bịsakwimaga pabutalị panōngwa ja lutēnde lwa kukubilwa kwake, bịsakutigi: Hītata! Hītata! Gwe kāja akakulūmba, Babelị gwe kāja kā maka! Buno ukulōngịgwa kwako kwịsịle ku sala jimojēne ịtolo.
66018011	Bope nabakyụlụsị bā nkisu bịsakundililaga nukukụ̄ta,
66018012	papo najumo ugwa kūla ifya mụngalaba syabo; ifịtwalo fya sahabu, na fesa, namabwe amapala, ninyēmba īmbala, nimyenda imyelụ imịtakanyịfụ, nimyenda imịfụbīfụ ubutị̄tu, nimyenda gya halịlị, nimyenda imịkesefụ, nutupịkị tōsa utwa lūma ulunụnụ, nutūndu tōsa utu tusongolị̄gwe ukufụma mmino ga sofụ, nutu tusongolị̄gwe ukufụma mmịpịkị imịpala, utwa kikuba ikyelu, nutwa fyela, nutwa mabwe ga malịmalị;
66018013	nifịlungo fya mfịndu ifị bịkuti kinamoni na amononi, nutwa kufụ̄kisya, ninyēmba īnụ̄nga, na lubanị, nubwalwa bwa māfị̄lu, ninyēmba sya mịsyunguti, nubufụ ubutịne, ninganụ, ning'ombe, ning'osị, nifalāsị, namagelētị, nabatumwa nimyojo gya bāndu.
66018014	Syope īseke sya mịpịkị isị umōjo gwako gwanyonywaga, sịjōngịle kumyako; tōsa utwa mafụta nutu tụkubikuka, tujongịle ịtolo kumyako, kangi najumo atịsakutwagamo sịku.
66018015	Abakyụlụsị ba tūndu tutūtu, aba bakabilaga muli jūjo, bịsakwimaga pabutalị panōngwa ja lutēnde lwa kukubilwa kwake,
66018016	bo bịkulila nukukụ̄ta fịjo, bịkuti: Hītata! Hītata! Gwe kāja kakulumba, gwe gwafwikịgwe imyenda imyelụ imịtakanyịfụ, nimịfụbifụ ubutị̄tu, nimịfụbifụ, gwe gwanosịgwe na sahabu nutubwe utupala, ninyāmbo īmbala;
66018017	namanga ku sala jimojēne ịtolo, ubukabị bwako bōsa bwịpelịle kisāme. Bōsa abendesyangalaba, nabendanjila, nābabōmbị ba mụngalaba, na bōsa aba ubukyụlụsị bwabo bwa mụnyanja,
66018018	balinkwịkịma pabutalị, balinkukụta bo balibwene ilyosị lyake bo ịkupya, balinkuti: Kali ko kāja kaliku aka kafwene nakāja akakulūmba aka?
66018019	Po papo balinkwinyambila ulufụ̄mbi kumịtu gyabo, balinkukōlela bo bikukụ̄ta nukulila fịjo, balinkuti: Hītata! Hītata! Gwe kāja kakulumba, mụno bōsa aba bali ningalaba mụnyanja, bakabilaga mbukabị bwake; ku sala jimojēne ịtolo gwịpelịle ukuja kisāme.
66018020	Gwe kị̄su kya kumwanya, na mwe bikemo, na mwe batumịgwa, na mwe bakụngụlụka, amụsekelege panōngwa jake, namanga Kyala anngomokịsye isị ababombelaga umwe.
66018021	Po papo ugwandumị jumo ugwa maka alinkupīmba ilị̄bwe ili lyaliti lwala ulukulūmba, alinkulisopa mụnyanja, alinkuti: Bo isakusopịgwaga bunobuno namaka Babelị akāja akakulūmba,
66018022	kangi atịsakwandisyamo ukuboneka. Akōgo ka bakubafisango, nabimbị, nabakubamalonge, nabakubangangabwịte, katịsakupilikịgwamo kangi mmyako, jope numfụndị gwa mbōmbo jōsa atịsakwagịgwamo kangi mmyako, kōpe nakōgo ka lwala katịsakupilikịgwamo mmyako;
66018023	lōpe nulumụlị lwa nyāle lutịsakumulịkamo kangi mmyako, lyope nịisyu lya mwegankị̄kulu nilya nkị̄kulu uju ịkwegịgwa, litịsakupilikịgwamo kangi; namanga abakyụlụsị bako bāli bo bakulūmba nkị̄su,
66018024	ubulosị bwako bwafịsofịfye ifịkolo fyosa; lyope nị̄lopa lya bakụngụlụka nilya bikemo, nilya aba bagogịgwe pakị̄su, lilinkuboneka mmyake.
66019001	Panyuma pali sịsịsị, ndinkupilika ukuti ịsyu ilịkulūmba lya fịlundilo fịfịngị kumwanya, lịkuti: Haleluja! Ubupokị nubukulūmba namaka, fyo fya ju Kyala gwitu;
66019002	papo ubulōngị bwake bwa nalolị kangi bugolofụ, namanga andongị̄le unkị̄kulu unhahanị unkulūmba, uju akyonangaga ikị̄su nubuhahani bwake; lyope nị̄lopa lya batumwa bāke, lyo anngomokịsye.
66019003	Abene balinkwandisya ulwa bubili balinkuti: Haleluja! Ilyosị lyake lịkufyuka kumwanya bwịla na bwịla ịtolo.
66019004	Po papo abakulu ba fịpanga amalōngo mabili na bāna (24) bala, pamopēne nifyumị fịna fịla, balinkwịtaga pāsi nukumbụngụlụkila Kyala, uju atugesye pakikota kya butwa, balinkuti: Amenị, Haleluja!
66019005	Po papo ilịsyu lilinkufụma kukikota kya butwa lilinkuti: Amụntụfyege Kyala gwitu, mwesa mwe batumwa bāke mwe mụkuntịla, mwe banāndi na mwe bakulūmba.
66019006	Kangi ndinkupilika ukuti ịsyu ilịkulūmba lya filundilo fịfịngị, lilinkufwana kōbela kwa misi ga mịngị, kangi lilinkufwana kulụndụma kwa njasị ija maka, lilinkuti: Haleluja! Namanga UNTWA Kyala gwitu, Umwenemaka gōsa, jo ịkulagila.
66019007	Ịsaga tusekelege, tulụlụtilege, kangi tumpege ubukulūmba; buno ubwegị bwa Kang'osị bwịsịle, jope nunkasị ịtendekị̄sye;
66019008	kangi ịtikisịgwe ukufwala imyenda imyelụ, imịtakanyịfụ, igi gịkung'alịka; namanga umwenda umwelụ ugu, syo mbōmbo sya bikemo īngolofụ.
66019009	Umwene alinkummbūla une alinkuti: Sịmbaga utigi: Basangalufụ aba babilikilịgwe kufị̄ndu fya pabwegị bwa Kang'osị. Kangi alinkummbūla alinkuti: Agā go masyu ga Kyala aga nalolị.
66019010	Po papo ndinkugwa nkyenị mmalundi gāke ndinkuti numbụngulụkilege. Umwene alinkumbula alinkuti: Gwandege, syo ungabombaga bo sịsịsị, buno nanịne ndi ntumwa nnịno ịtolo, pamopēne nabāmyinụ aba bikunsịsịmịkisya Jesụ. Umbụngụlụkilege ju Kyala, namanga ulusịsịmịkisyo lwa kunsịsịmịkisya Jesụ, jo mbepo gwa bukụngụlụka.
66019011	Kangi ndinkukubona kumwanya kwịgwịke; ndinkujibona īfalāsị īnyēlụ, na uju alị̄togịlepo papo, jo ājobịgwaga ukuja nsūbilịgwa kangi gwa nalolị; jo ịkulongela nukulwila ubwịte mbugolofụ.
66019012	Agene amāso gāke gali bo sị ndapi sya mōto; pantu po afwele īngiga sya butwa sị nyịngị; asịmbịgwe īngamụ iji najumo akajimanya, lolị jūjo mwene;
66019013	afwikịgwe unselekesye ugu gwajụbikịgwe mwịlopa, īngamụ jake jo ịsyu lya Kyala.
66019014	Fyope nifīlūndilo ifya bwịte ifya kumwanya filinkunkonga, bo fịtogịle pafalasị īnyēlụ; fyafwikịgwe imyenda imyelụ imịtakanyịfụ imịnụnụ.
66019015	Nkanwa mmyake mo lụkusoka ulūbo ulugị ulwa kufịgogela ifịkolo fyōsa; kangi isakufịtị̄maga ningịlị ja kyela, nukukikanyanga ikya kukamịlamo amāfị̄lu ga bukalale bwa ngalalisị sya Kyala, Umwenemaka gōsa.
66019016	Kangi panselekesye gwake na pakyima kyake asịmbịgwe īngamụ iji jịkuti: NTWA GWA BATWA, KANGI MALAFYALE GWA BANYAFYALE.
66019017	Po papo ndinkummbona ugwandumị jumo īmịle mwịsuba, ịkukōlela ilịsyu ilịkulūmba, ịkusibūla īnjunị syosa isị sịkupụlụlụka pakāti na pakāti mụmpālānga, ịkuti: Amwịsege mụbungānege pafị̄ndu ifịkulūmba fya Kyala;
66019018	ukuti mụlyege īnyama ja batwa ninyama ja balōngōsị ba bwịte, ninyama ja ba maka, ninyama ja fwalasị nija aba bịtogilepo, ninyama ja bāndu bōsa, abābuke, abatumwa, abanāndi nabakulūmba.
66019019	Po papo ndinkummbona kinyamāna pamopēne nabatwa ba nkisu, pamopēne nifīlūndilo fyabo ifya bwịte, babūngēne ukuti balwege ubwịte na uju ịtogịle pafalasị jila, nifīlūndilo fyake ifya bwịte.
66019020	Po papo kinyamāna alinkukoligwa pamopēne nunkụngụlụka gwake ugwa butụngulu, uju ābōmbaga ifị̄ka nkyenị mmyake, muli ifị ābasyobelāngamo abāndu aba balyambilịle ikimanyịlo kya kinyamāna, naba bakibụngụlụkilaga ikifwanị kyake. Bo babili bababa balinkutagịgwa abūmị ịtolo mụnyanja ja mōto, ugu gukwaka nikibịlịtị.
66019021	Lolị bōsa aba basyele balinkugogịgwa nulūbo lwa uju alị̄togịle pafalasị, ulu lwasōkaga nkanwa mmyake. Po papo īnjunị syosa sịlinkwịkuta īnyama jabo.
66020001	Po papo ndinkummbona ugwandumị ịkusụlụka ukufụma kumwanya, jo akōlị̄le ikị̄gulilo kya bwịna bwa ngolōngo, nunnyololo unnywamụ nkiboko kyake.
66020002	Alinkunkola nyị̄fwila jula, ju njokangulu, uju jo ju Mohesi kangi jo setano,
66020003	alinkumpịnya ifyinja elịfụ jumo (1,000); alinkuntāga mbwịna bwa ngolōngo, alinkwịgalako, nukubikapo ikikolekelo pamwanya, ko kuti angandisyaga ukufịsyoba ifịkolo fya bāndu, ukufịka apa fịsakumalikilaga ifyinja elịfụ jumo (1,000); panyuma po fịkuti abūlịgwege kukabalilo akanāndi ịtolo.
66020004	Po papo ndinkufịbona ifịkota fya butwa, aba batugesyepo bo bapēgịgwe ukuja balōngị; kangi ndinkugibona imyojo gya aba babolịgwe imịtu gyabo panōngwa ja kunsịsịmịkisya Jesụ, na panōngwa ja ịsyu lya Kyala, aba bākānaga ukubụngụlụka kwa kinyamāna na kukifwanị kyake, aba bakalyambilịle ikimanyịlo pafyenị fyabo na pamaboko gābo; bo balinkuja bumị ịtolo, balinkulagila pamopēne na Kilisịtị ifyinja elịfụ jumo (1,000).
66020005	Loli abafwe aba basyele bo balinkusịta nukuja bumị, ukufịka apa fịmalikilege ifyinja elịfụ jumo (1,000).
66020006	Uku ko kusyuka ukutasị. Jo nsangalufụ ịtolo kangi mwịkemo, uju ali nikijabo mbusyuka bwa kwanda, namanga jujuju jo ubufwe bwa bubili bukaja namaka pamyake; lolị bịsakujaga bapụ̄tị ba Kyala kangi ba Kilisịtị, bo bịsakulagilaga nagwe ifyinja fila elịfụ jumo (1,000).
66020007	Lelo bo fịmalịke ifyinja elịfụ jumo (1,000), po setano
66020008	ịsakwabuligwaga ukufụma mụnnyololo gwake; po ịsakusōkaga, ukwịsa kukufịsofya ifịkolo fyosa ifị fịli mụ̄ngụto syo ịna isya kị̄su, jo ju Gogị na Magogị; isakubabunganịkisyaga kubwịte, aba ubwịngị bwabo buli bo gu nsanga gwa kunyanja.
66020009	Po papo balinkufyuka pabwelefụ bwa kị̄su, balinkugasyembetelela amasasa ga bikemo nakāja akaganịgwa; lolị umōto gulinkusụlụka ukufụma kumwanya, gulinkubalya.
66020010	Jope numohesị uju ābasyobaga, alinkusopịgwa mụnyanja ja mōto nikibịlịtị, mụno ālịmo jope kinyamāna pamopēne nunkụngụlụka gwa butụngulu; bịsakufụndịgwaga bwịla na bwịla, pamụ̄sị napakilo.
66020011	Kangi ndinkukibona ikikota kya butwa ikikulumba ikyelu, ndinkummbona na uju atugesyepo; ikyene ikị̄su kya pāsi nikya kumwanya filinkumbopa, filinkusịta nukupaga napamo pabujo.
66020012	Po papo ndinkubabona abafwe, abakulūmba nabanāndi bīmịle nkyenị nkikota kya butwa; kangi ndinkwaga bakalata babalulị̄gwe, jope na kalata ujūngi abalulị̄gwe, uju jo kalata gwa bumị. Abēne abafwe balinkulongelịgwa muli isị syasị̄mbị̄gwe mwa bakalata, ukufwana nimbōmbo syābo.
66020013	Jope ninyanja jilinkubasakula abafwe aba bāli mụmo; bope ubufwe nubusyuka filinkubasakula aba bāli mụmo, balinkulongịgwa jumojumo ukufwāna nimbōmbo syake.
66020014	Po papo ubufwe nubusyuka filinkusopịgwa mụnyanja ja mōto; īnyanja ja mōto jijiji, bo bu bufwe bwa bubili.
66020015	Uju linga akāsimbigwēmo mwa kalata gwa būmị, jo alinkusopịgwa mụnyanja ja mōto.
66021001	Po papo ndinkukibona ikya kumwanya ikipya nikya pāsi ikipya, namanga ikya kumwanya ikitasị nikya pāsi ikitasị fyo fyājongile; jope ninyanja jilinkusịta nukujako kangi.
66021002	Kangi ndinkukabona akāja akị̄kemo, aka jo ju Jelụsalemụ umpya, kịkusụlụka ukufụma kumwanya kwa Kyala; kị̄tēndekị̄sye, kị̄nosīsye bo jo nkị̄kulu uju ịkubūka kunndume.
66021003	Po papo ndinkupilika ilịsyu ilịkulūmba lịkufuma kukikota kya butwa, lịkuti: Kēta, ubwịtūgalo bwa Kyala buli mbāndu; umwene ịkutūgalaga mmyābo, abene bo bịkujaga bāndu bāke; umwene Kyala jo ịkujaga nabo.
66021004	Ịsakubapyasilaga amāsosị gōsa, bope nubufwe nalinga bo busulumanịe, nalinga ko kukụ̄ta pamo ko kubaba fitịsakujangako kangi;
66021005	namanga n̄dasị syosa sịkīndịle. Umwene uju ịtūgēsye pakikota kya butwa jo alinkujoba alinkuti: Sịmbaga, buno amasyu aga go masubiligwa kangi gā nalolị.
66021006	Po papo alinkummbūla alinkuti: Sịmalị̄ke. Jo une ne Alfa jo une ne Omega; ne bwandilo kangi ne bumalikilo. Uju linga umị̄lwe, jo nisakunnwesyaga ịtolo amīsi aga gịkufụma mụnyị̄buko ja misi ga bumị.
66021007	Uju linga ịkwịpela ntolị, jo ịsakusịngilangapo sịsịsị, une nịsakujaga ne Kyala gwake, umwene jo ịkujaga mwanāngu.
66021008	Abēne lolị abōga, nabalosị, nāba bịkufibombela ifịfwanị, nabatūngulu bōsa ịtolo, bo ikijabo kyabo kịkujaga mụnjanja iji jịkwakā umōto nikibịlịtị, ubu bo bu bufwe bwa bubili.
66021009	Po papo alinkwị̄sa jumo mbāndumị bahāno na babili bala aba bākolịle inyāngabya ịhāno na ịbili isị syali nubutolwe buhāno na bubili bula ubwa bumalīkisyo, jo alinkujoba nanine alinkuti: ịsaga kuno, nikukunangisyaga unkịkulu uju ịkwegịgwa, unkasị gwa Kang'osi.
66021010	Po papo alinkumbimbila mwa Mbepo, alinkwakumbīka pakyamba ikikulumba ikitalị, alinkūnangisya akāja akị̄kemo Jelụsalemụ, bo kịkusụlụka ukufụma kumwanya kwa Kyala;
66021011	ko kāli nubukulūmba bwa Kyala, ukumụlika kwake kwali bo ilị̄bwe ilị̄pala, kwali bo ilị̄bwe lya jaspi, ili lili swē ịtolo bo ilịgalāsi;
66021012	kali nịmato ilịkulūmba kangi ilịtali, kāli nifịpata kalōngo na fịbili. Pafịpata po bālipo abāndumị kalōngo na babili, syope ningamụ syasị̄mbị̄gwe pāpo, isị fyo fịkolo fya bany'Ịsịlaelị kalōngo na fịbili.
66021013	Kulubafụ lwa kubusōkelo kāli nifịpata fịtatu, kulūlu kāli nifịpata fịtatu, kwịtōngo kāli nifịpata fịtatu, na kulubafụ lwa kubujōngelo kāli nifịpata fịtatu,
66021014	lyope nịmato lya kāja lyali ninyālo kalōngo na ịbili; panyālo sịsịsị po syasịmbịgwēpo īngamụ kalōngo na ịbili sya batumịgwa ba Kang'osị kalōngo na babili.
66021015	Umwene uju ājobaga nanịne, jo āli ningịlị ja sahabu ija kupimila, ko kuti akapimege akāja, nifịpata fyāke, nịmato lyake.
66021016	Akēne akāja kājēngị̄gwe mbubaga, ubatalị bwake bwafwene ịtolo nubwelēfu. Po papo alinkukapima akāja ningịlị jila, alinkwaga kali pa sịtatịja baelịfu kalōngo na babili (12,000) ubutalị, nubwelēfu nubutalị bwa kumwanya bwake,
66021017	fyāfwēne ịtolo. Kangi alinkupima ilịmato lyake, alinkwaga lili pafụtị imịa jimo namalongo mana na ịna (144) nkipimilo kya bāndu, iki ābōmbelaga ugwandumị.
66021018	Ilyene ilịmato lyo lyajengị̄gwe namabwe ga jaspi, akēne akāja ko kāli ka sahabu ntupu, kāli swē bo ilịgalāsi.
66021019	Isyene inyalo sya ịmato lya kāja syo syanosīgwe namabwe amapala aga fịkolo fị fịngị; ulwalo lwa kwanda lwali lwa jaspi, ulwa bubili lwali lwa safili, ulwa butatu lwali lwa kalịkedonị, ulwa buna lwali lwa sịmalịngịtị;
66021020	ulwa buhāno lwali lwa salịndoniki, ulwa ntandatu lwali lwa Sardioni, ulwa buhāno na bubili lwali lwa Krisoliti, ulwa lwele lwali lwa Berili, ulwa buhāno na buna lwali lwa Topasi, ulwa kalōngo lwali lwa Krisoplasi, ulwa kalōngo na lumo lwali lwa hiakinti, ulwa kalōngo na bubili lwali lwa Ametisti.
66021021	Ifyene ifịpata kalōngo na fịbili, fyāli nyāmbo īmbala kalōngo na ịbili; ikipata kimo kimo lwali lwambo lumo ulupala, gōpe numpulo gwa kāja āli jo sahabu ntupu, gwalangalaga bo ilịgalāsi.
66021022	Ndinkusị̄ta nukumbonamo Tempelị mụmo, namanga Tempelị gwake jo ju NTWA Kyala Umwenemaka gōsa, na ju Kang'osi.
66021023	Akēne akāja ko katịkulonda ukuti ilị̄suba numwesị fịbalege mụmo, namanga ubukulūmba bwa Kyala bụkukamulịka, kangi īnyāle jake jo ju Kang'osi.
66021024	Ifyēne ifịkolo fyosa fyo fịsakwendelaga ndumụlị lwake, bope nabatwa ba nkisu bịsakubutwalaga ubukulūmba bwabo mụmo.
66021025	Ifyene ifịpata fyake fyo fịtịsakwịgalịgwamo sịku pamụ̄sị, papo ikilo kyo kitịsakujangamo mụmo.
66021026	Kangi abene batịsakutwalaga mụmo ubukulūmba nulwimiko lwa fịkolo fyosa.
66021027	Nakamo akāndu akanyalị katịsakwịngilamo sịku mụmo, jope umpelakinyanyasị nuntungulu bātisakwịngilamo, lolị bene bābo basimbigwe mwa kalata gwa būmị gwa Kang'osi, bo bịsakwịngilaga,
66022001	Po papo alinkūnangisya ulwisi lwa misi ga bumị, ulu lụkubikuka bo ilịgalāsi, ulu lụkufụma nkikota kya butwa kya Kyala, nikya Kang'osị.
66022002	Pakāti na pakāti pampūlo gwake, pāmbali palwisi ịsīlya ili na ịsīlya lila, gwalipo umpịkị gwa būmị, ugu gwapaga īseke kalōngo na ịbili, Mmwesị gumogumo gwapāngamo kamo; agene amānị ga mpịkị gula, gāli ga kufịgangulila ifịkolo fyōsa,
66022003	Nakamo akāndu akagụnịgwa katịsakujangamo mụmo. Ikyene ikikota kya butwa ikya Kyala nikya Kang'osi, kyo kịsakujaga mụmo; abene abatumwa bāke bo bịsakumbombelaga jūjo;
66022004	bịsakuketanaga nagwe, jope ningamụ jake jịsakujaga pafyēni fyābo.
66022005	Ikyene ikilo kitịsakujangapo kangi, abene bakafụmbwamo nulumụlị lwa nyāle, pamo ulwa ịsuba, namanga UNTWA Kyala jo ịsakubamụlikaga, bịsakujaga balagilị na kubusịtakumalika sịku na sịku.
66022006	Po papo alinkummbūla alinkuti: Amasyu aga masubiligwa kangi ga nalolị; umwene UNTWA Kyala, umwenenasyo mbepo sya bakụngụlụka, jo ālintumịle ugwandumị gwake kukubanāngisya abatumwa bāke isị fịkuti sị̄sege nakalīnga.
66022007	Keta, ndịkuhāba ukwịsa; nsangalufu uju linga ịkugakola amasyu ga bukụngụlụka aga mwa kalata uju.
66022008	Jo une ne Yohani, ne nasịpilīke nukusịkēta syosa sịsịsị. Lelo bo nsịpilị̄ke nukusịkēta, po ndinkugwa pāsi nukubụngụlụka nkyenị mmalundi ga gwandumị, uju ālīnāngị̄sye sịsịsị.
66022009	Umwene alinkummbūla alinkuti: Gwandege, syo ungabombaga sịsịsị, buno nanịne ndi ntumwa nnịno ịtolo, kangi ndi ntumwa mwịnābo gwa aba bịkugakola amasyu ga mwa kalata jujuju; umbụngụlụkilege ju Kyala.
66022010	Po papo alinkummbūla alinkuti: Ungagakolekelaga amasyu ga bukụngụlụka aga mwa kalata uju; namanga akabalilo kasegelị̄le.
66022011	Ndeke umbombambịbị abōmbēge ububị̄bị bwāke, jope nunnyalị ndeke abōmbēge inyāli syake, jope nungolofu ndeke abōmbēge isya bugolofụ bwāke, numwịkemo ndeke abōmbēge sị sya bwịkemo bwake.
66022012	Keta, ndịkuhāba ukwịsa; fyope nifịhombigwa fyangu ndi nafyo, ifya kunhōmba umụ̄ndu gwesa, ukufwana nimbōmbo jake.
66022013	Jo une ne Alfa, jo une ne Omega, ne ntasị kangi ne gwa kūsụlo, ne bwandilo kangi ne bumalikilo.
66022014	Basangalufụ aba bịkusụka imyenda gyabo, ukuti babagilege ukubuka pampịkị gwa bumị nukuti bendelege mfịpata ukwịngila nkāja.
66022015	Pānja po balịpo aba bị̄pelịle mbwa ịtolo, nabalosị, na bahahanị, nabagogị, naba bikufịbombela ifịfwanị, na gwesa uju abuganịle ubutūngulu kangi ịkububomba.
66022016	Jo une Jesụ, ne nuntumile ugwandumị gwangu, ugwa kubasịsịmikisya umwe syosa sịsịsị mfipanga; jo une ne Nsị kangi ne lujụ̄ngụ lwa Ndabịtị, jo une ne Kipandabusịku, ne lutondwa ulwelụ.
66022017	Umwene Mbepo na ju nsịngilịgwa bịkuti: Ịsaga! Jope na uju ịkupilika ātigi: Ịsaga! Jope na uju linga umị̄lwe, jo ị̄sege, na uju linga ịganịle, jo ị̄sege, egege ịtolo amīsi amapelabūmị.
66022018	Nikunsịsịmikisya gwesa uju ịkugapilika amasyụ ga bukụngụlụka, aga mwa kalata jujuju, nịkuti: Uju linga ịkongelapo sịmo pali sịsịsị, jo Kyala ịsakummongelangapo ulufụ̄ndo lōsa
66022019	ulu lusị̄mbị̄gwe mwa kalata jujuju. Kangi na uju ịkusosyapo sịmo mmasyụ ga kalata gwa bukụngụlụka bububu, jo Kyala ịsakukisosyangamo ikijabo kyake mụmpịkị gwa bumị, na nkāja akị̄kemo, ifị fịsịmbịgwe mwa kalata jujuju.
66022020	Umwene uju ikusịsịsịmikisya sịsịsị, jo ikuti: Ena, ngwịsa ndịkuhāba. Amenị! Ịsaga gwe NTWA Jesụ.
66022021	Ilị̄pyana lya NTWA Jesụ lijege nanụmwe mwesa. a7:65 Ulịmụ na Tumịmụ: --------------- ------------------------------------------------------------ --------------- ------------------------------------------------------------
